87a3(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe rlung gi rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di lta ste/ rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnam par mthor rlung zhes bya ba dang / rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnam par mthor rlung chen po zhes bya ba dang / rlung gi rgyal po chen po shug+sas
87a4(mdo sde): dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / rlung gi rgyal po chen po rjes su cher chags zhes bya ba me tog dang / spos thams cad dang lhan cig ldan zhing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan
87a5(mdo sde): bdas kyi seng ge'i sgra'i chos snang ba'i sgo zhu bar byed do/ / sprin gyi rgyal po chen po 'bum phrag du ma yang glu dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs sgrogs shing / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs te/ bcom ldan
87a6(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ seng ge'i sgra'i chos kyi snang ba'i sgo zhu bar byed do// yang de'i tshe seng ge dpa' ba la sogs pa ngang pa'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag la ngang pa'i rgyal po re re yang
87a7(mdo sde): 'khor dang pa 'bum phrag du ma dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ngang pa'i skad dpe med pa dag gis bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
87b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// ngang pa'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i
87b2(mdo sde): tshe rma bya'i rgyal po legs mthong la sogs pa/ rma bya'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la rma bya'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor rma bya 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/
87b3(mdo sde): lhags nas/ rma bya'i sgra skad snyan pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rma bya'i rgyal po
87b4(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe khu byug gi rgyal po sde la sogs pa/ khu byug gi rgyal po
87b5(mdo sde): 'bum phrag grangs med pa la khu byug gi rgyal po re re yang 'khor khu byug 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ khu byug gi skad snyan pas bcom ldan
87b6(mdo sde): 'das la bstod de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// khu byug gi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/
87b7(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe ka la bing+ka'i rgyal po pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i mig la sogs pa ka la bing+ka'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la/ ka la bing+ka'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor ka la bita 'bum
88a1(mdo sde): phrag grangs med pa dag/ ka la bing+ka'i sgra skad snyan pa 'byin cing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa yang dag pa dag gis
88a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// ka la bdi'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha
88a3(mdo sde): stag go/ / yang de'i tshe shang shang te'u'i rgyal po rgyal ba la sogs pa/ shang shang te'u'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la/ shang shang te'u'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor shang shang te bu 'bum phrag grangs med
88a4(mdo sde): pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i sgra skad snyan pas bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/
88a5(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// shang shang te'u'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i
88a6(mdo sde): tshe bya'i rigs 'dres pa la sogs pa tha dad pa grangs med pa la bya'i rigs 'dres pa re re la bya'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa yod de/ bya'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor bya 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang /
88a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ so so bya skad kyi rol mo'i sbrang pe med pa'i gdangs kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i stong pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom
88b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// bya'i rigs 'dres pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag
88b2(mdo sde): la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ / yang de'i tshe seng ge'i rgyal po rin po che pad+ma la sogs pa/ seng ge'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la seng ge'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor seng ge 'bum phrag grangs med
88b3(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ seng ge'i sgra skad rol mo'i sgra snyan pas/ bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod nas/ bcom ldan
88b4(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// seng ge'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam
88b5(mdo sde): par rtse ba sha stag go/ / yang de'i tshe spos kyi glang po rgyal po'i ri ka'i na bun lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ spos kyi glang po'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la spos kyi glang po'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor
88b6(mdo sde): spos kyi glang po 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das
88b7(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// spos kyi glang po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge
89a1(mdo sde): @'dzin pa dang padag la rnam par rtse bdas sdug to/ / yang de'i tshe sbrul dang / stag dang / ri dgas rigs tha dad pa 'dres pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong ste lhags/
89a2(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// sbrul dang / stag dang / ri dgas de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa dang
89a3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ / yang de'i tshe sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang /
89a4(mdo sde): sbrang ma dang / bi shu ka dang / nya dang / ru sbal dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang / se sa ra dang / 'ug pa dang / sdig pa dang / srin gyi rigs grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa dag dang / sdig sprul
89a5(mdo sde): tha dad pa 'dres pa gnas pa thams cad dang / phag dang / khyi dang / wa dang / gzhan yang srog chags phra mo rnams/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
89a6(mdo sde): yang dag pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe sbrul dang / myur du gdug pa
89a7(mdo sde): dang / sbrul gzi gu dang / sbrul mi bzad pa'i gdug pa'i rigs 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis/
89b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe lhun po dang / lhun po chen po dang / btang bzung dang /
89b2(mdo sde): btang bzung chen po dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dag dang / ri gzhan dag gi lha rnams rang rang khang par zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
89b3(mdo sde): la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis mngon par bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub
89b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ / yang de'i tshe sman dang / nags kyi lha thams cad rang rang gi khang par zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga
89b5(mdo sde): la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
89b6(mdo sde): lha de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dngapa ba sprin chen snying po'i 'khor rnams dang / byang chub sems/
89b7(mdo sde): dba' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skad cig gcig la bskal pa brgya mtsho dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal
90a1(mdo sde): du med pa tshad med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la 'jug par mdzad pa de ni ji ltar shes par rung / bcom ldan 'das rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bskal pa bye ba
90a2(mdo sde): phrag ni ji snyed/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu ni/ thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyi mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang / ye/
90a3(mdo sde): shes dang / gzigs pa dang / khams dang / rgyu dang / dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / bdags pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba dag gis/ sems
90a4(mdo sde): can rgya mtsho ji snyed cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad cig gu snyam mo/ / yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
90a5(mdo sde): bapa sangs rgyas kyis gnang ste/ mi 'jigs pa thog pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
90a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sprin chen snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo las/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brla
90a7(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas na gzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis
90b1(mdo sde): brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'chi 'pho rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
90b2(mdo sde): gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhums su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
90b3(mdo sde): gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhumasu cha phra bar snang ba rnam par gzhag
90b4(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lum bi ni'i skyed mos tshal du phyogs su gzigs pa
90b5(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lum bi ni'i skyed mos tshal du gsung brjod//
90b6(mdo sde): pa rnam par bzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lum bi ni'i skyed mos tshal nas/
90b7(mdo sde): grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin
91a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi dbang phyug chen po rim gro byed du bong ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen
91a2(mdo sde): po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs kyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de
91a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byis pa'i rtsed mo rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs
91a4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi yi ge slob pa'i grwa gang du gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin
91a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi yi ge dang / bstan bcos dang / lag rtsis dang / brtsi ba dang / shod dgod pa bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo
91a6(mdo sde): yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma dam bcas pa thob par bya ba'i bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la
91a7(mdo sde): sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi
91b1(mdo sde): stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skyed mos tshal gyi sar gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
91b2(mdo sde): byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgan po dang / nad pa dang / shi ba dang /
91b3(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba la gzigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa
91b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas nas/ mngon par 'byung ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// /
91b5(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi na bza' ngur smrig bzhes pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do//
91b6(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' ba spyod cing bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo
91b7(mdo sde): yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' ba spyod pa las bzhengs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang
92a1(mdo sde): ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi khrus mdzad pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i
92a2(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhal zas la longs spyod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos
92a3(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i
92a4(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i
92a5(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdud 'gugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang
92a6(mdo sde): pa'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo
92a7(mdo sde): yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang
92b1(mdo sde): pa'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i
92b2(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lan gsum du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i
92b3(mdo sde): byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi me'i 'od dang / glog gi bod dang / zla ba dang /
92b4(mdo sde): nyi ma'i 'od dang / nor bu'i bod dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'od rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin
92b5(mdo sde): chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgyal po'i bka' rnam par bzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen
92b6(mdo sde): snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs bzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po/
92b7(mdo sde): sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi long ba dang / 'phye bo dang / lkugs pa dang / 'on pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i
93a1(mdo sde): sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
93a2(mdo sde): rten du skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mi khom pa/
93a3(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/
93a4(mdo sde): kyi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa
93a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la
93a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu ba dang / gcer bu la sogs pa mu stegs byed pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i
93a7(mdo sde): sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dug brgyad cu rtsa bzhi kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya
93b1(mdo sde): ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'phrog ma kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor
93b2(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sor mo'i phreng ba'i nang kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlab
93b3(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag
93b4(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi klu'i rgyal po sogs ma med kun tu
93b5(mdo sde): 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mu ge kun tu
93b6(mdo sde): 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chom
93b7(mdo sde): rkun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
94a1(mdo sde): kyi mings kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de
94a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi klu'i gnas dag tu bye ma rab tu babar ba kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin
94a3(mdo sde): chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi klu'i gnas dag tu nam mkha' lding kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes
94a4(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge 'dun gyi dben kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs
94a5(mdo sde): la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi brag 'phen pa dang / 'jog pa kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
94a6(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi glang po che nor gyi 'jug pa kun tu

94b1(mdo sde): mo sku byed kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sdung ba'i sgo yod ngo do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa
94b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi kun tu sgyu ma mdzes mas sgro btags nas/ kun tu rgyu kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen

95b1(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo lo/

96a1(mdo sde): po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'khor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen

96a4(mdo sde): snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po

96b2(mdo sde): rgyu dang rkyen gyi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'dres pa rnam

96b4(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nga rgyal med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
96b5(mdo sde): gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do/ / sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par

96b7(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed yod do/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer chags pa med pa/ 'jigs pa med pa'i rigs zhes bya ba'i bod zer gyi 'khor grangs med pa dag kyang byung ste/
97a1(mdo sde): des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mgo mog par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog
97a2(mdo sde): tugyur pa bstan te/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas nas/ phyir log ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lan grangs med
97a3(mdo sde): par bskor bar byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus la phog par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos mi 'jig pa
97a4(mdo sde): thob nas/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/
97a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa'
97a6(mdo sde): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhug
97a7(mdo sde): pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
97b1(mdo sde): 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'chi 'pho rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par
97b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhums su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis
97b3(mdo sde): brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom
97b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhums su cha phra bar snang ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
97b5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bi ni'i skyed mos tshal du sku bltam pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs
97b6(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan
97b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis lum bi ni'i skyed mos tshal du gom pa 'dor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
98a1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bi ni'i skyed mos tshal du phyogs su gzigs pa rnam
98a2(mdo sde): par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu/
98a3(mdo sde): bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bi ni'i skyed mos tshal du gsung brjod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med
98a4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bi ni'i skyed mos tshal nas grong khyer chen po ser
98a5(mdo sde): skya'i gnas su gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de
98a6(mdo sde): dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po rim gro bgyid du mchi ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas
98a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis stobs
98b1(mdo sde): kyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan
98b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa'i rtsed mo rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla
98b3(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge slob pa'i grwa gang du gshegs pa rnam
98b4(mdo sde): par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir/
98b5(mdo sde): bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge dang bstan bcos dang / lag rtsis dang / brtsi ba dang / shod dgod pa bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/
98b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma/
98b7(mdo sde): dam bcas pa thob par bgyi ba'i bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod
99a1(mdo sde): pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la
99a2(mdo sde): sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer chen
99a3(mdo sde): po ser skya'i gnas nas/ bskyed mos tshal gyi sar gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
99a4(mdo sde): byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan po dang / nad pa dang / shi ba dang / rab tu byung ba gzigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
99a5(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom
99a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byung bar mngon par phyogs te/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas nas/ mngon par 'byung ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems/
99a7(mdo sde): dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis na bza' ngur smrig bzhes pa rnam par gzhag
99b1(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom
99b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis dka' thub spyod cing bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag
99b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' thub spyod pa las bzhengs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa'
99b4(mdo sde): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khrus mdzad pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis
99b5(mdo sde): brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan
99b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis zhal zas la longs spyod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag
99b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems
100a1(mdo sde): dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi
100a2(mdo sde): snying po la bzhug pa/ rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das/

100a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud 'dul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la
100a5(mdo sde): sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
100a6(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag
100a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub
100b1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum du bzlas te/
100b2(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
100b3(mdo sde): bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhugs kyi bod dang / glog gi 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / nor bu'i 'od dang /
100b4(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong gi 'od rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
100b5(mdo sde): byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i bka' rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/
100b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs bzhi

101a4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu mi khom pa sna

103b3(mdo sde): thams cad na yang / bgrod pa ni gcig pur bas te/ gnyis dang gsum du ma mchis pa 'di ni chos nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag

104a2(mdo sde): thams cad ni stong pa ste lta bar gyur pa rnam par dag pa lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin las stong pa nyid
104a3(mdo sde): gzhan ma lags kyi/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin nyid stong pa nyid lags te/ lta bas gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid shes pa des chos thams cad stong pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lta bar

104b7(mdo sde): dor ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slang du ste/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin las blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ blang ba
105a1(mdo sde): dang dor ba ma mchis pa lags te/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa lags na

105a3(mdo sde): dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni bdeg pa dang / 'jog pa ma mchis pa ste/ bdeg pa dang / 'jog pa rnam par dag pa

105b1(mdo sde): 'das chos thams cad ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ 'dus byas rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'dus

105b4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dngos gzhi ma mchis pa lags te/ dngos
105b5(mdo sde): gzhi rnam par dag pa lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin las/ dngos gzhi ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags

106a1(mdo sde): / tubagatu bdadag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis labar di bsdu bar gastsam/ bcom ldan 'das rgyas thams cad ni gnas ma mchis pa ste/ gnas rnam par dag pa lagasas/
106a2(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gnas kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ gnas kyi rang bzhin las gnas ma mchis pa gzhan ma mchis pa lags te/ gnas kyi rang bzhin gyis/ gnas
106a3(mdo sde): ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad gnas ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa gang
106a4(mdo sde): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa lags te/
106a5(mdo sde): dngos po rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dngos po'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ dngos po'i rang bzhin las dngos po ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ dngos
106a6(mdo sde): po'i rang bzhin nyid/ dngos po ma mchis pa lags te/ dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis/ dngos po ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos
106a7(mdo sde): po rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
106b1(mdo sde): 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gnyis su ma mchis pa lags te/ gnyis rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin ma lags pa'i slad du/
106b2(mdo sde): ste/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin las gnyis su ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ chos thams cad gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid/ gnyis su ma mchis pa lags te/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis/ gnyis su ma
106b3(mdo sde): mchis pa shes pa des/ thams cad gnyis su ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
106b4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags te/ mtshan
106b5(mdo sde): nyid rnam par dag pa lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin las mtshan nyid ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ mtshan
106b6(mdo sde): nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags te/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis/ mtshan nyid mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das
106b7(mdo sde): kyis mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

107a2(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ dmigs pa'i rang bzhin las/ dmigs pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ dmigs pa'i rang bzhin nyid dmigs pa ma mchis pa lags te/
107a3(mdo sde): dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad dmigs pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dmigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs
107a4(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
107a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni dbu ma'i lam lags te/ mtha' rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mtha'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ dbu ma'i lam gzhan ma lags kyi
107a6(mdo sde): mtha'i rang bzhin nyid dbu ma'i lam lags te/ mtha'i rang bzhin gyis dbu ma'i lam shes pa des/ chos thams cad dbu ma'i lam lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mtha' rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
107a7(mdo sde): gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom
107b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos thams cad ni lus ma mchis pa lags te/ lus rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lus kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ lus kyi rang bzhin las/

109b4(mdo sde): rang bzhin las/ bdag ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin gzhan ma lags kyi/ bdag gi rang bzhin nyid bdag ma mchis pa lags te/ bdag gi rang bzhin gyis/ bdag ma mchis pa shes pa des

109b6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa lags te

110b7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma lags te/
111a1(mdo sde): yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du /

111a7(mdo sde): pa'i tshul gyis mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang / ye shes dang / gzigs pa dang / khams dang / rgyu dang / dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / gdags pa dang
111b1(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ sems can rgya mtsho ji snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang
111b2(mdo sde): lags pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag gi lhags pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud de/ phyogs
111b3(mdo sde): bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mthong bar 'dod pa mkhyen nas/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir/ zhabs gnyis
111b4(mdo sde): kyi mthil nas/ bod gzer rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed phyung ngo // de bzhin du
111b5(mdo sde): zhabs kyi sor mo'i tshogs re re dang / de bzhin du rje ngar gnyis dang / de bzhin du pus mo'i lhang gnyis dang / de bzhin du brla gnyis dang / de bzhin du sta zur dang / de bzhin du rtsib logs gnyis
111b6(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin du lte ba khung dang / de bzhin du brag pa gnyis dang / de bzhin du dpung mgo gnyis dang / de bzhin du dpung pa gnyis dang / de bzhin du lag mthil gnyis dang / de bzhin du phyag sor
111b7(mdo sde): gyi tshigs re re dang / de bzhin du gtsug tor dang / de bzhin du mdzod spu dang / de bzhin du dbu'i sgra nyag ma re re dang / de bzhin du mtshan re re dang / de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang / de bzhin du
112a1(mdo sde): skugi phung du re re nas/ 'od zer rgyal mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa skyed
112a2(mdo sde): phyung ste/ shar phyogs su 'phros so// de las 'od zer gcig gis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi
112a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang 'od zer gcig gis khyab pa de gnyis kyis khyab par mi byed do// shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du

112a5(mdo sde): du steng dang / 'og gi phyogs su yang 'od zer rgya mtsho de dag thams cad 'phros so// de las 'od zer gcig gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
112a6(mdo sde): 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ gang gcig gis khyab pa de gnyis kyis khyab par mi byed do// yang de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi
112a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'od zer de dag gis snang bar byas pa/ gang yin pa de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
112b1(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' re re'i 'khor kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig
112b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhags na/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig
112b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhig
112b4(mdo sde): bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa snyed lha
112b5(mdo sde): ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams
112b6(mdo sde): lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lnga ci
112b7(mdo sde): spos 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung brgya'i bye ma snyed lta ci
113a1(mdo sde): smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor
113a2(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i bzhi cha snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i brgyad cha snyed lta ci smos//
113a3(mdo sde): 'khor gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i bcu drug cha snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i cha nyi shu snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag brgya lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba
113a4(mdo sde): phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba bra lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba gcig lta ci smos te/ byang chub sems
113a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin bsod nams kyi
113a6(mdo sde): tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par phab nas/ bcom ldan 'das
113a7(mdo sde): ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po
113b1(mdo sde): bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor ro// gtor cing mngon par gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan grangs med par bskor ba byas te/ phyogs
113b2(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do/ / shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su yang de dang 'dra'o// shar lho'i mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o// lho nub kyi mtshan
113b3(mdo sde): su yang de dang 'dra'o/ / nub byang gi mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o// byang shar gyi mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o// steng du yang de dang 'dra'o// 'og gi phyogs su yang de dang 'dra ste/ 'jig rten
113b4(mdo sde): gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag 'od zer de dag gis snang bar byas pa de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas kyang byang chub sems dpab rgya mtsho/ gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul 'bum
113b5(mdo sde): phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab
113b6(mdo sde): kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyis 'khor bskor na/ 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor
113b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'i rdul za rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci spos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
114a1(mdo sde): bskyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci spros/ 'khor
114a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag brgya lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor
114a3(mdo sde): bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba gcig lta ci smos te/ byang chub sems dpa'
114a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po re res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis char gyis chags pa med cing / sgrib pa med
114a5(mdo sde): la ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par phab nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin sa rgya mtsho grangs
114a6(mdo sde): med pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor to// gtor cing mngon par gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
114a7(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan grangs med par bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod // yang de'i tshe phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs cha re rer 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i
114b1(mdo sde): klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho las/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la byang chub sems
114b2(mdo sde): dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed gnas par gyur te/ 'on kyang sems can su la yang gnod pa
114b3(mdo sde): bam sgrib pa med do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams dang / gling rnams dang / lhun po dang / lhun po chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang / gangs chen po dang /

114b5(mdo sde): dang / grong brdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang rnams la yang / gnod pa 'am/ sgrib pa med do// sngon ji lta ba de bzhin du phyis kyang bya ba la 'jug par gyur to// byang
114b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang / bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du zhugs par mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i
114b7(mdo sde): chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i
115a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyis mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang / ye shes dang
115a2(mdo sde): gzigs pa dang / khams dang / rgyu dang / dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / gdags pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba dag gis sems can gang dag
115a3(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad pa dag ci thams cad 'khor 'dir 'dus sam/ 'on te gzhan yang dag par mi 'dus pa dag kyang yod dam zhig gu snyam mo//
115a4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la bka'
115a5(mdo sde): stsal pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dper na/ nyan thos chen po rgya mtsho rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa la rnam par rtse ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye/

115a7(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed bskyed de/ nyan thos chen po re res kyang / sems bskyed par re res gom pa
115b1(mdo sde): 'dor ba rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed song la/ gom pa re re bor bas kyang 'jig rten gyi
115b2(mdo sde): khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'da' bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
115b3(mdo sde): gang du nyan thos chen po gcig 'gro ba der gnyis mi 'gro ba de lta bu'i tshul gyis/ bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang+gA'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag byed
115b4(mdo sde): khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed du 'gro bar byed de/ shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du sher lho'i mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams dang
115b5(mdo sde): de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi mtshams phyogs song zhing / nyan thos chen po gcig gang du song ba der/ gnyis mi 'gro la/ de nas mi la la
115b6(mdo sde): zhig gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu byas la/ srid pa'i rtse mor thug par ra bas kun nas bskor te/ lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur cing
115b7(mdo sde): rdo dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas nas/ bye mas bkang ste/ byur bur byas la de nas mi des bye ma'i grong khyer de nas/ bye ma 'bru re re nas blang la/ grong khyer de'i nang gi bye ma'i 'bru
116a1(mdo sde): ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi char bsres te/ brtsi ba'i thabs 'dis bye ma'i 'bru de dag thams cad char bsres la de nas mi de bye ma'i 'bru char bsres pa de
116a2(mdo sde): dag thams cad shar phyogs su khyer te/ bye ma'i 'bru char bsres pa de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'das shing bye ma'i 'bru char bsres pa gcig bor te/ brtsi ba'i thabras
116a3(mdo sde): 'dis bye ma'i 'bru char bsres pa de dag thams cad bor te/ shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho dang / de bzhin du nub dang / de bzhin du byang dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams
116a4(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi mtshams su bor la// de nas mi nges 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho
116a5(mdo sde): gang dag tu bye ma'i 'bru char bsres pa de dag bor ba dang / gang dag tu ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu byas la/ srid pa'i rtse mor thug par ra bas kun
116a6(mdo sde): nas bkor te/ lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur cing / rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas nas/ bye mas bkang ste byur bur byas la/ nga'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor
116a7(mdo sde): 'dir 'dus pa 'di dag ni bye ma'i grong khyer de las/ bye ma'i 'bru gcig tsam du zad do// nga'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dir ma 'dus pa ni/ grong khyer de'i nang gi bye me lhag ma ji snyed pa tsam mo//
116b1(mdo sde): de'i lhag ma'i bye ma snyed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang ming mthun la/ rus gcig pa sha stag yin na/ ming tha dad pa dang / rus tha dad pa lta ci smos/ bya
116b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog yongs su grub pa mtha' yas pa la bsgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
116b3(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa du mar sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can yongs su sbyong ba dang / sems can gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su smin
116b4(mdo sde): par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag 'di snyams du sems te/ bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis
116b5(mdo sde): nang nas/ kha cig gi sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa mthong ba na ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor
116b6(mdo sde): de'i nang du bsdu ba dang / de dag gi sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa bstan pa'i phyir/ se gol gyi sgra mdzad do// de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang
116b7(mdo sde): dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag gi 'dab kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag gi ches pha rol 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho

117a2(mdo sde): tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yo/ rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ che ma chem/ rab tu che ma chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrug/ rab tu 'khrug
117a3(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ 'ur bur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re na/ shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho// nub
117a4(mdo sde): phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ / lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho// byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho// byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/

117b7(mdo sde): byang mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs mgo// mtha' dma' na dbus mtho// dbus dma' na mtha' mtho bar gyur to// yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i/

118a4(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgreng / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla res ni bres/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos ni byugs/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas ni bkab/ rin po che
118a5(mdo sde): 'thon kha chen po ni mig mangs ris su bris/ nor bu rin po che'i dra ba'i phyogs re re gnas kyang mu tig rgyan 'phreng kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med
118a6(mdo sde): grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo / / rin po che'i rgyan 'phreng kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'byung ngo // dar gyi lnga ldi kha dog sna tshogs pa
118a7(mdo sde): kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo / / ras kyi lda ldi kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med
118b1(mdo sde): grangs med pa dag 'byung ngo / / dar gyi chun kor kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa dpag tu med pa dag 'phyang ngo dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba kha dog sna
118b2(mdo sde): tshogs pa/ kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo // rin po che'i rgyan phreng dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng de dag la/ rlung gis phyogs na yang
118b3(mdo sde): lha'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ rin po che'i rgyan 'phreng dang / mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng rlung gis phog pa de dag las lha'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba de lta bu ni/ sil snyan gyi yan lag dpe med pa 'dun
118b4(mdo sde): phrag bye ba rdung ba'i slob dpon gyis brdungs pa las kyang / de lta bu'i sgra snyan pa mi 'byung ngo // dril bu g.yer ka'i 'phreng ba rlung gis phog pa de dag las lha yul pa'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing zab pa 'byung
118b5(mdo sde): ba de lta bu ni/ gser gyi snod 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshad tsam brdung ba las kyang de lta bu'i sgra zab cing yid du 'ong ba mi 'byung ngo // mig mangs ris re re la yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa re re yod de/
118b6(mdo sde): rin po che'i stegs bus ni bskor/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i 'greng bas ni mdzes par byas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgreng / rin po che'i rgyan 'greng gi rgyan
118b7(mdo sde): dpag tu med grangs med pas ni brgyan dpag tu med pas kyang brgyan to/ / ras kyi lnga ldi'i rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / me tog gi lnga ldi'i rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / dril bu/
119a1(mdo sde): g.yer ka'i dra ba'i rgyan dpag tu med grungs med pas kyang brgyan to// rin po che'i shing ljon pa re re'i drung na yang rin po che'i seng ge'i khri 'phang dpag tshad lnga brgya pa yod de/ rin
119a2(mdo sde): po che'i stegs bus ni bskor/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / rin po che'i 'breng bas ni mdzes par byas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba da na ni bsgreng / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bla res ni
119a3(mdo sde): bres tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos ni byugs/ me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po dang / man 'dzu sha dang / man 'dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang
119a4(mdo sde): 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / sna ma dang / bar shi ka dang / ta ru ni dang / bal li dang / go ta ra ni dang / rab tu dri zhim pa dang / da ni ska ri dang / lha'i sna ma dang / ut+pa la dang
119a5(mdo sde): pad+ma dang / ku mu dA dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / me tog chen po rnams ni bkram/ nor bu rin po che chen po glog gi sgron ma'i rgyan phreng gi brgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che nyi
119a6(mdo sde): zla'i sgron ma'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i
119a7(mdo sde): rgyan phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che ze ba can gyi rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che seng ge'i ze ba can gyi rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che seng ge rgyal mtshan
119b1(mdo sde): / gyi rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che lha thams cad kyi 'od kyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i bod kyi rgyun 'phreng gi rgyan
119b2(mdo sde): dang nor bu rin po che pad+ma ral gyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che chu 'dag gi rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che a na da snyil gyi rgyan phreng
119b3(mdo sde): gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to/ / nor bu rin po che rdo'i snying po'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// nor bu rin po che
119b4(mdo sde): mdzes bkod kyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to/ / mu tig dkar po'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig mthon ka'i rgyun phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig ser po'i rgyan
119b5(mdo sde): phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to/ / mu tig dmar po'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig gser mdog gi rgyan phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig nam mkha' bdog gi rgyan phreng
119b6(mdo sde): gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to/ / mu tig gi 'bru'i ngos re re dang / rin po che'i 'bru'i ngos re re nas kyang / sems kyi skad cig re re la 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang /
119b7(mdo sde): mtshungs pa med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / tshad med pa dag byung ngo // de la 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa
120a1(mdo sde): dag 'byung ngo / / 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin la
120a2(mdo sde): cig las ni pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod pa dag byung ngo / / 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni sa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag
120a3(mdo sde): byung ngo / / 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni gzungs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni rnam par thar pa tha dad pa rgya
120a4(mdo sde): mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa dag byung ngo / / 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung
120a5(mdo sde): ngongo/ / 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni mngon par shes pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni smon lam tha dad pa rgya/

120b1(mdo sde): / 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa rjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan
