153a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad btag/
153a4(mdo sde): pa 'dis btags pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
153a5(mdo sde): dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i sgo 'di ni mos par gyi dka' ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin
153a6(mdo sde): teji skad smras pa bzhin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/
153a7(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i sgo bstan pa 'di legs par spras lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di ni
153b1(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa yin no/ / 'di ni chos kyi char chen po yin no// de nas shing sA la chen po lta bu'i bram ze mnyam pa nyid du gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
153b2(mdo sde): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni mnyam pa nyid bsam gyi mi khyab pa lags te/ de la yi ge mi dmigs/ tshig 'bru mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
153b3(mdo sde): kyi bu de de bzhin te/ chos kyi dbyings la tshig 'bru mi snang don kyang mi snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
153b4(mdo sde): 'das stong pa nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa gang lags/ rnam pa gang lags/ rtags gang lags/ mtshan ma gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal stong
153b5(mdo sde): pa nyid ni brjod du med pa/ bsnyad du med pa ste/ brjod du med pa'i chos nyid 'di la mos pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid ces bya'o// stong pa nyid de ni yi ge med pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid ces bya'o//
153b6(mdo sde): stong pa nyid de ni bsnyad du med pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
153b7(mdo sde): bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
154a1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ni mchog yin gyi/ dgra bcom pa'i shes pa ni de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgra bcom
154a2(mdo sde): pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las ring du gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
154a3(mdo sde): dpa' chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ nyan thos kyis ni nyan
154a4(mdo sde): thos kyi chos rnams ma thob pa nyid lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams ma thob pa ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang nyan thos la byang chub sems
154a5(mdo sde): dpa' dang lhan cig tu dris pa lan gdab pa 'am/ spyod pa'i byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i nus pa dang mthug la yodade nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad
154a6(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ bstan pa 'di gang la bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan
154a7(mdo sde): bdas kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ngas gang bstan pa 'di ni bstan pa med pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces
154b1(mdo sde): smras so/ / gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams thob bam/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na ci khyod so so'i skye bo 'am/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal
154b2(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ 'o na khyod ci slob pa 'am/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na khyod ci shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog yin nam/ smras pa/ de ni ma yin no// 'jam
154b3(mdo sde): dpal gyis spras pa/ gal te btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu so so'i skye bo yang ma yin slob pa yang ma yin/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog kyang ma yin na// de nyid khyod dmigs pa can du 'gyur ro//
154b4(mdo sde): ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni skyes bu dam pa rgya mtsho ltar gting dpag dka' ba khyod dang 'gyed par mi byed do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod ni rgan rabs
154b5(mdo sde): thu bo mchog yin gyis/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ma zer cig/ gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rgas pa'i dngos po ni ci yang thob par mi 'gyur/ mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur
154b6(mdo sde): ro/ / rigs kyi bu don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje ngan don gyis kyang ri brag chen po rnam par 'jig go/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod kyi rdzu
154b7(mdo sde): khung bu gcig na shes rab 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni kho bo lta bu'i sems can rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams la med do/ / rigs kyi bu don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir yang khyod la dpe bya'o// rigs kyi bu
155a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ ba glang glang po che shin tu mi bzad pa chen po de yang / mi stobs dang ldan pas lcags kyu chung ngus dul bar byed do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod ni
155a2(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pa/ kho bo ni nyam chung ba ste/ glang po che chen po 'di lta bu dang kho bo 'gyeng ga la nus de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
155a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ mi dmus long gis ni shul du mchis pa'am/ grong khyer mthong bar yang rngo mi thog na/ khyim nas khyim du mchi ba'i rdo lta ga la thog ste de ni gnas ma yin no//
155a4(mdo sde): de bzhin du glang po che chen po 'di lta bu 'di dag gi mdun na bdag ni dmus long dang mtshungs par mthong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag ni de tsam du rgya che ba lags so// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi
155a5(mdo sde): chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur te/ de ci bgyir yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ma zer cig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin
155a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i 'od kyis sems can ji snyed cig la reg pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob pa yin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du khyod ni ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas shing bsam gyis
155a7(mdo sde): mi khyab pa thob pa yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu las sems can dgu khri nyis stong gis chos mngon par rtogs par gyur to//
155b1(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog ta la la sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo
155b2(mdo sde): gros snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi pha rol nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
155b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis zhal mngon par bstan to/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar mthun pa sha stag go/
155b4(mdo sde): phyogs gcig ji lta bar phyogs bcu rnams nas kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chos kyi blo gros khyod de ltar byang
155b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la snyoms par zhugs pa legs so legs so/ / rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'di
155b6(mdo sde): nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon gyi byin gyis brlabs dang / khyod nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan pas/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bstan par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam
155b7(mdo sde): par sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyu kyi ye shes rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings su 'jug par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams rnam par dgrol bar bya ba dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes
156a1(mdo sde): la 'jug cing chung bar bya ba dang / kun tu sbyor bar bya ba dang / skad thams cad rjod par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos thams
156a2(mdo sde): cad la sgrib pa med par bya ba dang / dus gsum thams cad yongs su shes pa'i chos bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag
156a3(mdo sde): bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyang mtshan mthun pa 'di dag thams cad khyod la byin gyis brlob kyis/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu
156a4(mdo sde): las rtsom ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis chos bstan pa 'di la spobs pa skyed cig/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
156a5(mdo sde): gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la thog pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / chod pa med pa dang / brjod pa med pa'i chos nyid dang tha dad pa med pa'i ye shes
156a6(mdo sde): dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zil gyis mnon pa dang / zhum pa med pa dang / 'phrogs pa med pa'i chos nyid dang / brjod pa bzang po nye bar sgrub pa mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
156a7(mdo sde): ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyi mgo la
156b1(mdo sde): nyug pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la reg ma thag tu de nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
156b2(mdo sde): de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rigs 'di ni 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pas rgya che ba'o//
156b3(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
156b4(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ byang chub sems
156b5(mdo sde): dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gang dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba'i byang chub sems
156b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni gang yin/ gang las bsams te de skad smras/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu po de dag gang yin
156b7(mdo sde): pa de shod cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems
157a1(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs
157a2(mdo sde): so/ / gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa dang / las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye bar skyes pa
157a3(mdo sde): dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rgyal tsha ba dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag
157a4(mdo sde): pa'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po de dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
157a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/ / gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la sems dang po skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
157a6(mdo sde): 'di la sems dang po skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu gzugs bzang ba 'am/ mdzes pa 'am/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa 'am/ rgya che ba 'am/ gzi
157a7(mdo sde): brjid che ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'am/ kun rjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'am/ rjes su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngam/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong ngam/ de bzhin
157b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bsngags pa rgya cher thos na/ / 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bdod cing / thog ma nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
157b2(mdo sde): sems bskyed ma thag tu de nyid kyis bsnyen par dka' ba'i gnas bcu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
157b3(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba'i las dang / chos yang dag par blangs pa shes pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang / khams du ma sna tshogs shes pa dang / mos pa rnam par grol ba du ma shes pa dang /
157b4(mdo sde): dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang ldan pa thams
157b5(mdo sde): cad shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / lha'i mig gi shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa'i shes pa ste/ bsnyen par dga' ba'i gnas bcu po de dag yongs su bzungs par 'gyur ro//
157b6(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
157b7(mdo sde): chen po de sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad la sbyar bar bya'o// de la 'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu bya ba dang / zil gyis mi non pa dang / sangs
158a1(mdo sde): rgyas dpag tu med pa dang phrad pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor tu bya ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bzlog pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor
158a2(mdo sde): ba dang / sems can sdug bsngal ba yongs su bskyab pa yang brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis/ shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor zhing
158a3(mdo sde): gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang
158a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la las dang po pa'i
158a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la thog ma nyid du sems rnam pa bcu bskyed de rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phan par bya ba'i sems dang / bde bar bya ba'i sems
158a6(mdo sde): dang snying brtse ba'i sems dang / gnyen pa'i sems dang / sdug pa'i sems dang / phan bdags pa'i sems dang / kun tu bsrung ba'i sems dang / snyoms pa'i sems dang / slob dpon
158a7(mdo sde): gyi sems dang / ston pa'i sems te/ sems rnam pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dngag 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag
158b1(mdo sde): las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lung mnod pa dang / kha ton la sbyor bar bya'o// mang du thos nas rab tu dben pa la sbyar bar bya'o// rab tu dben par gyur nas dge ba'i shes gnyen la mngon
158b2(mdo sde): par dga' ba la sbyar bar bya'o/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' nas bka' blo bde ba la sbyar bar bya'o// bka' blo bde bar gyur nas dus shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o// dus shes par
158b3(mdo sde): gyur nas mi 'jigs pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ / mi 'jigs par gyur nas don shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o// don shes par gyur nas/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la sbyar bar bya'o// chos kyi rjes su 'brang
158b4(mdo sde): pabar gyur nas/ brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// rmongs pa med par gyur nas chos rnam par dgod pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid
158b5(mdo sde): kyis shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par brtson par byed cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/
158b6(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems rnam par gzhag
158b7(mdo sde): pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dmigs pa rnam pa bcus chos rnams rtogs par byed do// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams
159a1(mdo sde): cad la mi rtag pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang / chos thams cad la sdug bsngal ba nyid dang / bdag med pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / g.yo ba med pa nyid dang / dbugs
159a2(mdo sde): 'byin pa med pa nyid dang / gnas med pa nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid dang / rtsol ba med pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du byed pa nyid du rtogs par byed de/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur
159a3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir sbyor ba yang mi byed/ mi sbyor ba yang mi byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub
159a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ / chos kyi dbyings brtag pa la sbyar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o//
159a5(mdo sde): chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
159a6(mdo sde): 'di ltar de ni shas cher chos rnams la snang ba 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
159a7(mdo sde): dag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i
159b1(mdo sde): sras dag/ 'di la skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su sbyang ba byed pa bcus gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos nyid las phyir mi/
159b2(mdo sde): ldog pa dang / sangs rgyas la mi phyed pa'i dad pa mthar thug par 'gyur ba yongs su grub pa dang / chos nges par sems pa dang / sems can la rnam par dpyod pa dang / zhing la rnam par
159b3(mdo sde): dpyod pa dang / 'jig rten la rnam par dpyod pa dang / las la rnam par dpyod pa dang / rnam pa smin pa la rnam par dpyod pa dang / 'khor ba la rnam par dpyod pa dang / mya ngan las
159b4(mdo sde): 'das pa la rnam par dpyod pa ste/ yongs su sbyong ba byed pa bcu po de dag gis de dag gis gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni skye bar skyed
159b5(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// ma byon
159b6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos
159b7(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid rnam par dbyang ba la sbyar bar bya'o/ / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// mabyon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bzub
160a1(mdo sde): pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyod pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos
160a2(mdo sde): yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par spyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
160a3(mdo sde): chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs
160a4(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de de ni shas cher dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par byed cing
160a5(mdo sde): gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems/
160a6(mdo sde): dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs
160a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i las gang ci rtsom yang de thams cad sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad
160b1(mdo sde): la bde bar sbyar ba dang sems can thams cad la snying brtse bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad
160b2(mdo sde): drang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad dad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad gdul bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rtsom ste// kye
160b3(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par
160b4(mdo sde): bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can mtha' yas pa dang / sems can dpag tu med pa dang / sems can grangs med pa dang / sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can mtshungs
160b5(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / sems can gzhal du med pa dang / sems can stong pa nyid dang / sems can g.yo ba med pa nyid dang / sems can med pa nyid dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir
160b6(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher mngon par zhen pa med pa la sems 'jog cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i
160b7(mdo sde): sras dag/ 'di ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag gang
161a1(mdo sde): zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bcu thob pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/ bcu
161a2(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ chos kyi bsngags pa'am/
161a3(mdo sde): bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ byang
161a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams chung zhes 'chad pa 'am/ sems/
161a5(mdo sde): can gyi khams rgya che'o zhe 'am/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can zhe 'am/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin zhe 'am/ sems can gyi khams gdul bla zhe 'am/
161a6(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams gdul dka' zhe'am/ chos kyi dbyings chung zhe 'am/ chos kyi dbyings rgya che zhe'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag 'jig ce'am/ mi 'jig ce'am/ chos kyi dbyings yod ce/
161a7(mdo sde): 'am/ chos kyi dbyings med ces 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal
161b1(mdo sde): ba'i sras dag/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad
161b2(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya ba dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa nyid dang / med pa nyid dang / brdzun pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid me
161b3(mdo sde): panyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang / rmi lam lta bu nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir shas cher lhags pa'i
161b4(mdo sde): bsam pa rnam par 'phel ba'i chos can du gyur cing / gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te// kye rgyal
161b5(mdo sde): ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/
161b6(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dmigs pa bcu thos na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
161b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yod do zhe'am/ med do zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos yod do zhe'am med do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yod do zhe'am med do zhes bya ba dang /
162a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yod do zhe bam med do zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nges par 'byung ngo zhe 'am nges par mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba/
162a2(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'das so zhe 'am ma 'das so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag ma byon to zhe'am ma byon pa ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag da ltar byung ba'o/
162a3(mdo sde): zhe 'am da ltar byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad do zhe 'am mi zad do zhes bya ba dang / dus gsum po dag mtshan nyid gcig ces 'am mtshan nyid gcig pa ma yin no zhes thos kyang
162a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa ste/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
162a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' de la chos kyi rgyun bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang / tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya'o// mang ba dang
162a6(mdo sde): gcig pa nyid dang / yi ge la don sgro btags pa dang / don la yi ge sgro btags pa dang / dngos pos dngos po med pa sgro btags pa dang / dngos po med pas dngos po sgro btags pa dang / mtshan ma
162a7(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa sgro btags paM dang / mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma sgro btags pa dang / mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid med pa sgro btags pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa mtshan nyid sgro btags pa yang dag par brjod
162b1(mdo sde): par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher chos thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su smin pa'i tshul la nges par byung zhing / gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/
162b2(mdo sde): gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras ngag/ 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang
162b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/
162b4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ ngag gi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ yid kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba
162b5(mdo sde): mngon par bsgrub pa yin/ sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyi bsam pa shes par byed cing mos pa la rtog pa yin/ sems can gyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ bdod
162b6(mdo sde): pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams tha dadang rab tu shes pa yin/ dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i phyir mngon
162b7(mdo sde): par shes pa myur ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
163a1(mdo sde): de la chos mngon par bsgrub pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu
163a2(mdo sde): g.yo bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dpyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par 'gro ba dang /
163a3(mdo sde): dri ba grangs med pa dri ba dang / yid kyi lus mngon par sgrub pa dang / sgra skad la sbyor ba tshad med pa dang / sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa yongs su 'grub pa yang dag par brjod
163a4(mdo sde): par bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shas cher mngon par sgrub pa mkhas pa la sbyor zhing / gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa
163a5(mdo sde): thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
163a6(mdo sde): gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs par bya ba bcu la mkhas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi skye ba rtogs
163a7(mdo sde): par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nyon mongs pa rgyu ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyod yul la sbyor ba rtogs par bya
163b1(mdo sde): ba la mkhas pa yin/ chos nyid rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nye bar spyad pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi mkhas pa rnam par dbye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas/
163b2(mdo sde): pa yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba shes pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa la nges par rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/
163b3(mdo sde): don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ni rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' de
163b4(mdo sde): la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du kun tu spyang pa dang
163b5(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du rnam par dpyad pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i byin gyis brlabs dang / chos kyi rgyal
163b6(mdo sde): po'i pha rol gnon pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar de'i sems shas cher chos thams cad la
163b7(mdo sde): sgrib pa med par bsgrub la 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid bsgrub kyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni
164a1(mdo sde): rgyal tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
164a2(mdo sde): gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ shes pa mngon par sgrub pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
164a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rab tu g.yo bar byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyis khams grangs med pa byin gyis brlob pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sems gcig gis/
164a4(mdo sde): 'da' bar byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su sbyar ba byed pa mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i sems gcig gis rnam par rig par byed pa mang ba yin/
164a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa la rnam par lta ba mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i sems kyi spyod pa la sems gcig gis rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs
164a6(mdo sde): med pa'i dbang po sems gcig gis rtogs par byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
164a7(mdo sde): kyi sems la 'dzad pa la mkhas pa yin no/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rgyal tshab kyi sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' man can gang gis kyang dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
164b1(mdo sde): de'i lus kyi las shes par mi nus ngag gi las shes par mi nus/ yid kyi las shes par mi nus/ rdzu 'phrul shes par mi nus/ rdzu 'phrul la rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus/ 'das pa'i
164b2(mdo sde): dus la rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus zhing mngon par 'du byed pa shes par mi nus/ blos rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus/ sems kyi yul shes par mi nus/ ye shes kyi spyod yul shes
164b3(mdo sde): par mi nus te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag dbang bskur ba thob ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas bcom
164b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das dag gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par mdzad de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus gsum shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings
164b5(mdo sde): dbyer med pa shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byed pa dang
164b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa dang / chos thams cad mngon par shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' yas pa brjod
164b7(mdo sde): par mdzad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sems 'jug pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
165a1(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa
165a2(mdo sde): b cu bshad ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam
165a3(mdo sde): pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu
165a4(mdo sde): bur bur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur bur ro/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos
165a5(mdo sde): nyid thob pas lha'i me tog gi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab po/ / lha'i bdug pa'i sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo// lha'i spos kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo// lha'i phye ma'i sprin gyi char
165a6(mdo sde): dang / lha'i phreng ba'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i gos kyi sprin gyi char dang / lha'i rin po che'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i pad+ma'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i rgyan 'phreng gi sprin gyi char dang / lha'i rgyan gyi sprin gyi
165a7(mdo sde): char yang mngon par bab bo/ / lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang ma dgrol bar sgra byung ngo // lha'i snang ba yang rab tu byung ngo // lha'i nga ro yang grag go// gling bzhi pa 'dir ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i
165b1(mdo sde): khang par ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang chos bstan pa 'di khyab par gyur nas byung ste lhag chad med do/ / tshig 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis don 'di nyid ston to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus
165b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi pha rol nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed lhags te/ phyogs
165b3(mdo sde): bcu rgyas par bkang nas/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid 'di ston pa legs so// legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras
165b4(mdo sde): bdag cag kyang ming chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya ba dag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba sha stag gi thad nas
165b5(mdo sde): 'dir byin to/ / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de dag thams cad du yang chos bstan pa 'di byung ste/ 'khor 'di lta bu dag gi nang du tshig 'bru 'di dag gis don 'di nyid ston te lhag chad med do//
165b6(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag ni khyod kyi dbang du gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin to// bdag cag ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin pa de bzhin
165b7(mdo sde): d u phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad du ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnams su yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul
166a1(mdo sde): skyed byin par gyur / bam pa gnyis pa/ nas sa sa rgyas kyis byas byang chub sems dpa nas kyi thams kyis
166a2(mdo sde): bcur rnam par bltas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / chos kyi dbyings la yang rnam par bltas nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rang byung shin tu rnam dag blo mnga'
166a3(mdo sde): bamadzes shing gzugs kyi stobs dang ldan 'gyur ba/ / rnyed dka' mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong gyur nas// byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'jog byed// do zla med pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams
166a4(mdo sde): dang / kun rdzob bzang dang rjes su bstan pa dang // sdug bsngal bzang rlung 'jig rten 'gro mthong nas// byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'jog byed// yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas de bzhin
166a5(mdo sde): gshegs/ / kun tu bzang po'i yon tan thos gyur nas// nam mnga'i dbyings 'dra 'gyur ba med pa yi// byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'jog byed// gnas rnams ji snyed gang dag yod gyur dang /
166a6(mdo sde): rang bzhin gnas pa'i gnas rnams gzhan dag kyang // gzhan min dngos por rnam par rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'jog byed// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dus dag na//
166a7(mdo sde): dge dang mi dge las rnams gang yod pa// de dag rgyu rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'jog byed// ting nge 'dzin bsam gtan rnam thar spyod pa dang // de bzhin
166b1(mdo sde): snyoms 'jug rnam dag mthar thug pa/ / de dag gnas skabs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'dri 'jog/ 'jig rten brtson 'grus stobs dang dbang po rnams//
166b2(mdo sde): 'dra ci 'dra de yi de dang der// rim pa de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'jog byed// 'jig rten kun gyi mos pa ci 'dra dang // lhag pa'i bsam pa tha dad rnam gsum
166b3(mdo sde): nas/ / bstan bcos du ma rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du bstan pa sems 'jog byed// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma khams// gang dag 'jig rten gsum 'dir yod kun gyi//
166b4(mdo sde): khams kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du bstan pa sems de 'jog/ chos 'dir kun tu 'gro bar gang gyur cing // dge ba'i 'jug pa gang yang rab 'jug pa// yang dag rang bzhin/
166b5(mdo sde): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing rnams thams cad ji ltar 'byung ba dang // sems can ji ltar sa la 'byung 'gyur zhes// chags med mig ni rab tu
166b6(mdo sde): dbye ba'i phyir/ / byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'das pa'i dus dang da ltar byung dus na// sems can ris dngos mtshan nyid gang yod dang // sngon gyi gnas rnams rtogs par bya ba'i
166b7(mdo sde): phyir/ / byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ ji ltar 'gro bar sems can 'ching byed pa// kun tu sbyor ba 'jig rten gang yod pa'i// nyon mongs zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang
167a1(mdo sde): chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'jig rten gsum na tha snyad gang btags dang // ngag lam sngags tshul spyod pa gang yod pa// brda yi bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i
167a2(mdo sde): phyir/ byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ chos rnams thams cad brjod du med pa ste// stong pa mig yor rang bzhin ngo bo nyid// don dam bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub
167a3(mdo sde): don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ / zhing rnams dag tu sa g.yo bstan pa dang // rgya mtsho dag kyang rnam par 'khrugs pa dang // de bzhin gshegs kyis rdzu 'phrul brtan pa'i phyir// byang chub
167a4(mdo sde): don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'od zer rtse mo re las 'od zer rnams/ de bzhin phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu 'gyed// de dag 'od gcig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan
167a5(mdo sde): pa sems 'jog byed/ / zhing mang bsam gyis mi khyab gang yod pa// de dag rang gi lag tu mngon sprul te// sgyu ma'i tshul de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du bstan pa sems
167a6(mdo sde): 'jog byed/ / zhing rnams ji ltar de bzhin sems can kun// gnod pa med par lag pa'i mthil bzhag nas/ chos rnams srog med rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems
167a7(mdo sde): 'di 'jog/ rgya mtsho rnams na ji snyed chu yod pa// skra rtse'i thigs pa'i nang du 'jug par byed// ma lus mthar thug rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ zhing
167b1(mdo sde): / rnams kun na phra rab rdul gyi bag/ gang yod de dag ma lus bgrang byed cing // phra rab rdul grangs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'jig rten 'di na 'das
167b2(mdo sde): dang de bzhin du/ / ma 'ongs sreg pa'i bskal pas 'jig pa rnams// bskal pa zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ dus gsum dag gi de bzhin
167b3(mdo sde): gshegs rnams dang / / ston pa rang rgyal thos las byung rnams kyi// chos kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten
167b4(mdo sde): khams kyi rnams/ / skra yis bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs// dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ khor yug ri bo bsam gyis mi
167b5(mdo sde): khyab pa/ / sgra yis bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs// rags dang phra ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten khams rnams su//
167b6(mdo sde): skad cig gcig la dbyangs kyis go bar byed// dbyangs kyi yan lag dag pa bstan pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'jig rten kun gyi sgra rnams ci 'dra ba// skad cig
167b7(mdo sde): gcig la skad cig rjod byed cing / / zhi ba'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'jig rten gsum po ma lus rtogs par byed// sems can kun
168a1(mdo sde): gyis rab tu rnam par shes/ / lce yangs rgya chen rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ zhing rnams kun tu brjod dang 'dra bar yang /
168a2(mdo sde): skad cig gcig la lta gyur sel bar byed// rnam rtog chos rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'dir ni zhing rnams thams cad ma lus par/
168a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas gang zhig rang byung gi/ chos rnams skad cig gcig la rtogs pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ rdul phran tha dad lta bur 'jig rten khams//
168a4(mdo sde): rnam pa kun tu mngon par sprul byed cing // yid las byung ba de dag rtogs pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas rnams// ji snyed gang dag
168a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten bzhugs so cog/ sems kyis skad cig gcig la rtogs pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// tshig gcig brjod kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bskal
168a6(mdo sde): pa zad kyi de la nyams pa med/ / tshig rab dbye ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi// 'gro ba ci 'dra ldog pa
168a7(mdo sde): ci 'dra ba/ / sems kyi skad cig gcig la rtogs pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'jog byed// phyogs rnams kun tu 'gro yang lus kyis sam// ngag gam yid kyis gang
168b1(mdo sde): dubang chags pa med/ / dus gsum stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir// byang chub don du brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ byang chub sems ni ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin// gzhal yas bskal par phyog
168b2(mdo sde): su rgyu byed cing / / sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchod par bya'o zhes// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin// phyogs bcu dag ni 'jig rten tha dad par// 'jig rten bdag por rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur
168b3(mdo sde): ba/ / gang yang rung ba dam pa sgrog par byed// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin// byang chub don tu srid par spyad spyod tshe// byang chub sems dpa'i bde sbyar gang yin pa// de yi bsngags
168b4(mdo sde): pa rtag tu rjod par byed/ / 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin// chos mchog chos rab phul tu phyin pa dang // khyab par 'phags chos bla med gang yod pa// de dag byang chub sems
168b5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams la ston/ / 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin// yon tan kun ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi// tshe nyid 'di ni yod kyi gzhan med pa// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sbyor
168b6(mdo sde): bar byed/ / 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin// tshad med gzhal yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad 'gyur ci 'dra ba// byang chub sems dpa' de la ston par
168b7(mdo sde): byed/ 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin// ting 'dzin gang dag ji snyed yod pa dang // de bzhin ting 'dzin rgyud kyi rnam pa rnams// de dag bde gshegs sras la rjod par byed// 'di ni mi
169a1(mdo sde): ldog rnams kyis bstan pa yin/ / 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par zlog pa dang // dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor ba// 'jig rten kun gyis rtag tu ma bskor ba/
169a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bstan bya// shin tu sdug bsngal 'jig rten thas cad dang // ngan song rnam sa dag tu gnod gyur pa'i// gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur ba de//
169a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan par bya// gang zhig byang chub don tu sems 'jog pa// de ni dang po'i byang chub sems dpar bstan// bslabs pa'i gdams ngag ji bzhin nges byas
169a4(mdo sde): pa/ ji bzhin rnam par gzhag 'di de yi yin// nang bral rnams kyis bstan pa ji bzhin du// 'jig rten kun la phan pa bya ba'i phyir// de ltar thog ma su zhig sems bskyed pa// 'di ni
169a5(mdo sde): gnyis te dang po'i las can no/ / phan pa thob byed sems dang rab dang bde// gnyen dang sdug dang de bzhin sdud sems dang // kun tu bsrung ba'i sems dang snyoms pa'i sems// slob
169a6(mdo sde): dpon sems dang snyoms par ston pa'i sems/ / de 'dra dag la sems gnas gyur pa de// lung nod kha ton byed par sbyar bar bya// mang du thos nas dgon par gnas su gzhug/ dben
169a7(mdo sde): par gyur nas dge bshes bsten du gzhug/ dge bshes rnams la bka' blo bde bar bya// dus tshod shes la shes bzhin ldan par bya// dus shes gyur nas shin tu 'jigs med bya/
169b1(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med nas don la brtson par bya// don shes gyur nas de bzhin chos brjod bya// chos rnams kun la rmongs gyur med par bya// mongs pa med par gyur nas rgyal ba'i sras
169b2(mdo sde): legs par gsungs pa'i chos la gnas par bya/ / 'di ni dang po'i las can brjod pa ste// byang chub zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin// 'di ni gdams pa 'di ni bstan pa ste// 'di
169b3(mdo sde): la su slob de ni sangs rgyas sras/ / byang chub sems dpa' gsum pa gang yin pa// chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa rab tu sbyor// mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal stong nyid dang // bdag med pa dang
169b4(mdo sde): g.yo ba med pa dang / / de bzhin chos 'di thams cad bdag min dang // mngon par 'du byed med dang dben pa dang // 'di dag thams cad rtog pa med yin par// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar
169b5(mdo sde): rtog par byed/ / sems can khams dang chos kyi dbyings la yang // brtag par bya phyir de ni gzengs yang bstod// 'jig rten ni mtha' yas mu med ces// de ltar de ni dpyod du gzhug par bya//
169b6(mdo sde): 'di nas sa dang rgyu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang nam mkha' ji snyed yod pa dang // phyogs na 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa// de dag rnams la de ni dpyod du gzhug/ rgya chen chos rnams kun dang /
169b7(mdo sde): khams rnams kyi// rang bzhin ma lus mthar thug brtag bya ba// de ni sangs rgyas sras po sbyor byed la// phan par bya phyir rjes su bstan pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' skye bar gang skyes pa/
170a1(mdo sde): bstan la skyes shing rab tu 'byung bar byed// blo ldan de ni dngos me dngos po rtogs// dam chos gnas su skyes te legs par skyes// de ni rang gis sa las yod mi ldog/
170a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mthar thug yin par 'dzin pa ste// rtag tu chos la nges par sems dang ldan// sems can rang bzhin ci 'drar rnam par dpyod// las dang 'jig rten dag dang zhing rnams dang // rnam
170a3(mdo sde): par smin dang 'khor dang mya ngan 'das/ / rnam par dbye ba rgyal ba'i sras kyis shes// de thugs skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpar brjod// thams cad mkhyen pa 'das dang byung rnams dang // ma byon
170a4(mdo sde): dag kyang chos rnams rnam dpyad nas/ / grub dang gang yang legs skyes mthar thug dang // rang byung rnams kyi grub pa ci 'dra ba// sangs rgyas dam pa de dag thams cad ni// dus gsum mnyam
170a5(mdo sde): nyid rjes su zhugs pas shes/ / nam yang mnyam nyid byed brag 'byed mi byed// de ni dus gsum tha dad med par 'jug/ gang gi phan yon rnam pa 'di 'dra ba// de ni byang chub sems dpa' bzhi pa
170a6(mdo sde): ste/ 'di dag rab bsgrubs byang chub sems dpa' de// byang chub don tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste// sbyor ba phun sum tshogs par brjod pa yin// thab
170a7(mdo sde): la mkhas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ste/ / bsod nams las dag brtsoms pas mthar phyin byed// de ltar bsod nams rab tu ci byed kyang // 'jig rten kun gyi rten du 'gyur ba dang // phan par 'dod dang
170b1(mdo sde): bde ba thob byed dang / / snying brtse ba dang skye dgu 'grol 'gyur byed// 'jig rten gnod gyur gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// 'dren par byed cing rab tu dad pa byed// sems can mang po thams cad gdul 'dod
170b2(mdo sde): dang / mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis mthu yang che// 'jig rten thams cad tha ma med pa dang // de bzhin dpag tu med cing grangs med dang // mtshungs med bsam yas mnyam med gzhal yas dang /
170b3(mdo sde): stong pa mi g.yo med pa'i rang bzhin shes// de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste// sbyor ba phun tshogs phan dang snying brtser ldan// de la rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra ste// yon tan kun dang ldan pa rnams kyi
170b4(mdo sde): bstan/ / de ni sems can mtha' yas thams cad dang // chos kyi ngo bo nyid la rmongs pa med// shin tu blo ldan rtog bral rnam rtog med// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas dbyer mi phyed// sangs rgyas chos
170b5(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / / spyod pa'i bsngags dang bsngags pa ma yin dang // sems can chung ngam yang na che'o zhes// thos par gyur kyang bsam las nub pa med// sems can nyon mongs can
170b6(mdo sde): nam rnam dag gam/ / gdul bla zhe 'am gdul bar dka' zhe 'am// chos dbyings chung zhe'am yang na rgya che zhe 'am// 'jig par 'gyur zhe 'am 'chags par 'gyur zhe 'am// chos dbyings yod ce 'am
170b7(mdo sde): med ces thos gyur kyang / / dus gsum rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de// nges par sems shing thams cad rnam dpyod de// sangs rgyas chos 'dir bsam pa shin tu nges// mtshan ma med dang
171a1(mdo sde): mtshan nyid med pa dang / / dngos med rang bzhin rdzun zhing dben pa dang // sgyu ma'i rang bzhin mig yor 'dra ba yi// chos mchog zhi ba 'di 'dra nyan par byed// de ltar mi ldog byang
171a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni/ / sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // spyod pa yod dam med ces nges par dpyod// 'byung ngam mi 'byung zhe na'ang phyir mi ldog/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das zhe
171a3(mdo sde): 'am ma 'das zhe 'am/ / ma byon ce 'am ma byon ma yin zhe 'am// byung ngam ma byung zad dam mi zad dam// de bzhin mtshan nyid gcig gam mtshan nyid med// gcig dang tha dad rnam pa mang po dang //
171a4(mdo sde): don dang tshig 'bru dngos dang dngos med pa// thams cad sgro btags rnam pa gzhan nyid du// mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' yid ces byed// mtshan ma med dang mtshan ma yod pa dang // mtshan nyid
171a5(mdo sde): med dang mtshan gyis mtshon pa dang / / rnam par phye ba phan tshun sbyar ba rnams// thos nas 'di la mthar thug 'jug par byed// gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// lus dang ngag dang de
171a6(mdo sde): bzhin yid kyis kyang / / 'bras bu yod pa'i las rnams byed 'gyur zhing // ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'dir ni skye ba ston// pha rol rnams kyi bsam pa rtogs byed cing // de dag rnams kyi mos pa dpyod par
171a7(mdo sde): byed/ / sems can spyod dang rjes su mthun chos dang // zhing rnams 'jig dang 'chags pa rnams kyang shes// ji ltar 'dod bzhin myur du mngon shes thob// phyogs rnams kun tu yid ni 'jug par byed//
171b1(mdo sde): bde gshegs bsngags pa'i chos rnams thos nas kyang // de la dri ni nur bar 'gyur ba med// yongs su shes dang zhing g.yo byed pa dang // de bzhin byin gyis brlabs dang rnam dpyod dang // ji/
171b2(mdo sde): ltar skad cing grangs med 'gro 'gyur ba// zhing du 'gro bar bya ba brjod par bya// de ni dri ba grangs med 'dri bar byed// lus rnams ci 'drar yid kyi lus kyang ston// de la sgra skad sbyor ba 'jam klas dang /
171b3(mdo sde): sems gcig la yang sangs rgyas grangs med brjod// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba gang yin pa// sems can rnams kyi 'jug pa ji bzhin shes// de dag nyon mongs rgyud dang bag chags dang /
171b4(mdo sde): spyod yul gang yin sbyor ba gang yin dang // tha dad chos dang rgyu ba ci 'dra dang // 'jig rten rnam par phye dang sngon mtha' dang // brda yi bden dang don dam bden pa dag/ ma lus rtogs par bya la mkhas pa
171b5(mdo sde): yin/ / pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa tshar 'byin te// de yang ji ltar kun tu spyad pa dang // gan pa dang de bzhin 'jug par dang // pho brang 'khor ni ci 'dra dpyad pa dang // dam chos rgyal po'i dbang bskur
171b6(mdo sde): ci 'dra dang / / byin gyi brlabs dang gzhan gnod ci 'dra dang // chos la 'jug dang bka' lung brjod bya ste// 'di ni rgyal tshab sa la 'jug pa yin// de tsam gyis na de yi mthar thug ste// ji skad
171b7(mdo sde): bstan bzhin gzhan du 'gyur ba med/ / tshe yi 'du byed nam zhig 'dor ba na// tshul ldan rgyal tshab rgyal bar mngon du phyogs// dbang bskur gang yin bde gshegs sras gcig ste// thu bo khyad
172a1(mdo sde): 'phags mthar phyin bdag nyid can/ / skra thigs gcig gis chu tshad gzung du rung // 'di ni bsam pa bgrangs pas rtogs ma yin// rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa 'di
172a2(mdo sde): 'dra ste/ / 'di ni sems can la las zhing rnams kun// phra rab rdul du rlags nas ma lus bgrang // grangs med 'di snyed cig ces gcod byed pa// de kun 'dir ni byang chub sems dpas
172a3(mdo sde): shes/ / 'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas dang // gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa dang // rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin nyan thos kyi// sa bon gyur pa byang chub sems de skye// thog
172a4(mdo sde): mar byang chub sems zhes gang brjod pa/ / de ni ji lta'i tshul du'ang grangs med de// 'jig rten khams 'di kun kyang khyab gyur na// de las gong du brjod du ci zhig yod// de nas
172a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bshad pa legs par
172a6(mdo sde): smras so/ / rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa
172a7(mdo sde): yin na/ / gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag nges par sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro//
172b1(mdo sde): chos kyi blo gros kyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ba yin par
172b2(mdo sde): rig par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gi rna lam du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag grags par 'gyur ba'i skye bu dam pa
172b3(mdo sde): de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams la lung bstan par rig par bya ba yin na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gis lag tu thog pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus
172b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzigs su gsol/ bdag gis 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag ma 'tshal bas/ bdag ni dmus
172b5(mdo sde): long dang 'dra lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gcig pu dmus long lta bur gyur pa yang ma lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos pa de
172b6(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyang dmus long lta bur gyur pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas brtan de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/
172b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu song la/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong
173a1(mdo sde): pa thams cad bskul cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa bka' yang sgrogs shig/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa dkon mchog tA la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang 'khor der
173a2(mdo sde): sgrogs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thos nas/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir yongs su skom pas//
173a3(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la don 'di skabs brjod de chos nyan pa thams cad 'du bar gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs
173a4(mdo sde): 'chad cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyang ston par 'gyur gyis 'du bar gyis shig/ khyed phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/ kye grogs po dag mdo sde rin po che 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba
173a5(mdo sde): ni shin tu rnyed par dka'o/ / de nas skad cig de nyid la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
173a6(mdo sde): ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog tal la'i gzungs bshad/
173a7(mdo sde): gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsungs par gyur pas gnang ba mdzad do// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten myong ba thams cad kyis lan gnyis lan gsum
173b1(mdo sde): du gsol ba btab na yang / bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
173b2(mdo sde): kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ rigs
173b3(mdo sde): kyi bu gang la la dag dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
173b4(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la
173b5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod song la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gsol ba thob shig/ de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ shing p+lag sha dang
173b6(mdo sde): sbru la'i drung gzhan zhig na/ skyil mo krung bcas shing lus mi g.yo bar 'dug ste/ nyi ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pas lhag pa'i kha dog bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ brgya
173b7(mdo sde): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas 'dug par gyur te/ gser gyi kha dog lta bur lus dang dpal gyi lham me lhan ne lhang nger
174a1(mdo sde): 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad/
174a2(mdo sde): ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni khyod la chos bshad par gsol ba bdebs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la
174a3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzhi'i don 'di gang yin/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod ni shes rab zab pa ste/ kho bo ni khyod dang
174a4(mdo sde): 'gyed mi nus so/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ khyod snying las chung ngur 'dug shig dang / khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du bstan par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo nyan gyis
174a5(mdo sde): khyod kyis shong shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar byas so// de
174a6(mdo sde): nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gnas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dus par gyur te// rgyal po chen
174a7(mdo sde): po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa yang gnod sbyin bye ba du ma dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur to/ / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to// chos bdod pa rnams dang /
174b1(mdo sde): chos 'dod pa ma yin pa'i gang zag rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to// lha'i bu mo mang po yang 'dus par gyur to// dge slong gi 'khor dang / dge slong ma'i 'khor dang / dge bsnyen gyi 'khor dang / dge bsnyen ma'i
174b2(mdo sde): 'khor dang / de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bar gyi 'khor dang / 'thab bral gyi 'khor dang / dga' ldan gyi 'khor dang / 'phrul dga'i 'khor dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'khor dang /
174b3(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i 'khor dang / de bzhin du 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i 'khor rnams 'dus par gyur to// de bzhin du nyan thos kyi tshogs kyang 'dus par 'gyur te// 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
174b4(mdo sde): rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od bsrungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa
174b5(mdo sde): dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od bsrungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa lam phran brtan dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng
174b6(mdo sde): rgyas 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang skyong dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de dag
174b7(mdo sde): dang nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang / grags 'dzin la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya yang 'dus par gyur to// khams kyi rgyal po dang / stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dag kyang 'dus par gyur to//
175a1(mdo sde): rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi 'khor dag kyang 'dus par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
175a2(mdo sde): bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das deng 'di ltar 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di su'i mthu lags/ de ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
175a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi mthu yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs mnyan par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
175a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu song la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la gsol ba thob cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra
175a5(mdo sde): dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin rin po che bstan pa dkon mchog ta la la 'di shod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shwa
175a6(mdo sde): ra dwa ti'i bu dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di nyan par 'gyur ba su yin/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus spras pa/ 'khor bzhi 'dus pa 'di dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams 'dus
175a7(mdo sde): pa 'di dag ste kho bo yang nyan pa'i phyir 'ongs so/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos
175b1(mdo sde): nyan pa 'di dag ni sgra ma byung ba sha stag na kho bos su la chos bshad nyan pa ni su yin/ 'chad pa ni su yin/ gnas brtan gyis spras pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis shod cig/ kho bos mnyan to// 'jam
175b2(mdo sde): dpal gyis spras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bshad ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal bshad pa zhes bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// smras pa/ shA ra
175b3(mdo sde): dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ smras pa/ bajam dpal stong pa nyid ni tshig med pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te stong pa nyid tshig med pa
175b4(mdo sde): yin na/ ci zhig bshad par bya/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bstan du med pa yin te/ de dag ni bstan tu med cing mnyan du med do// gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod
175b5(mdo sde): kyis ji lta bu bstan pa/ de thams cad ni stong pa nyid bstan pa/ mtshan ma med pa bstan pa/ smon pa med pa bstan pa/ blang ba med pa bstan pa/ dor ba med pa bstan pa/ spros pa med pa bstan
175b6(mdo sde): pa ste/ ma spros pa bstan pa yin no// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag kyang rab tu dga'
175b7(mdo sde): nas/ mgrin gcig tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di legs par bshad do// zhes leg so zhes bya ba byin no//
176a1(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs ji ltar
176a2(mdo sde): gzung bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya/ bajam dpal gyis smras pa/ rab 'byor gzungs 'di ni skye ba med par yid la bya'o// dngos
176a3(mdo sde): po med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / dor ba med par yid la bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub
176a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ / lha dang mi drug cu rtsa gnyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub
176a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
176a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po ji 'dra ba zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni/
176a7(mdo sde): gang khams gsum pa yongs su mi gtong ba ste/ 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu ston pa 'di ni snying rje chen po ni yin no// gang sems can
176b1(mdo sde): / tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su 'dzin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dor ba 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir lus dang /
176b2(mdo sde): srog yongs su gtong ba 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang 'dod chags spyod pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa yang dag par rjod pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang sems can stobs
176b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams la byams pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po yin no/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
176b4(mdo sde): thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su bya'o/ / 'dre ba med pa mang du bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// skye bo mang po
176b5(mdo sde): la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan
176b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / thugs rtse ba mnga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/
176b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed kyi nang na phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub
177a1(mdo sde): pa'i dus kyi tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par spobs yod/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'a
177a2(mdo sde): dngal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen tho ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngan sang sdong dang / byang chub
177a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyis mngon 'phags rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa
177a4(mdo sde): blo gros mi dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen ze ba ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' nar bu'ong dang / byung chub sems dpa'
177a5(mdo sde): gtsug nor zacan dang / byang chub sems dang pa rnam par lnga dang / byang chub sems dpa' bltar mi mthong dang / byang chub sems dpab rtag tu lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag nang
177a6(mdo sde): rje / byang chu ba sems dpa rin chen phung po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tog dpa 'angs
177a7(mdo sde): phying chubasems pa na dang la dang / byang nabasems dpa bsod nams dpas dang / byang chub sems dang 'a da dpa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi bla zas dang / byang
177b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' bdud rtsi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsam yas blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyis brgyan dang /
177b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dgod cing dbang po thams cad rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rtse mo rdol pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub
177b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' spobs pa mkhas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa myur dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam
177b4(mdo sde): mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi
177b5(mdo sde): gdugs snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mngon 'phags rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spob
177b6(mdo sde): pa dpa' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi grin gcig tu tshig tu smras pa/
177b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das slang ma'i cha slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe/ bdag cag thams cad 'dus shing tshogs te/ dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs yang
178a1(mdo sde): dag par bshad par spo lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni bya dka' ba ste/ go cha 'di'adra
178a2(mdo sde): ba 'di ni shin tu bya dka' ba'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu skye bo mang po la phan pa dang
178a3(mdo sde): skye bo mang po la bde bar 'gyur ba dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs nyon cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te sngags bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
178a4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad ya thA/ oM maM/ b+ha ra Te b+ha ra Te/ b+ha ra b+ha ran te swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi a la la chos a la la chos
178a5(mdo sde): a la la chos shes lan gnyis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to//
178a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das chos chos shes bgyi ba 'di'i gzhi'i don gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to// chos thams
178a7(mdo sde): cad kyi gzhi'i don ni dngos po med pa'i gzhi'i don to/ / chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni nam mkha'i gzhi'i don to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni blang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don to// chos thams cad kyi
178b1(mdo sde): gzhi'i don ni dor ba med pa'i gzhi'i don to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'on ci'i slad du chos thams cad ces bgyi/ bcom ldan
178b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang /
178b3(mdo sde): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos thams cad ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir stong pa'o// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon
178b4(mdo sde): nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di ji ltar gzung bar bya// de skad ces smras pa dang
178b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin nyid bstan pa dang / skye ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'byung ba med pa'i de
178b6(mdo sde): bzhin nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi
178b7(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid du gzungs 'di gzung bar bya ste/ rigs kyi bu dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di gzung ba dang / kun tu gzung ba dang / bsgom pa dang / rnam par dpyad pa dang / gdags pa dang /
179a1(mdo sde): rab tu gzhag pa dang / rnam par dgrol ba dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / gsal bar bya ba ni 'di 'dra ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bsgom pa
179a2(mdo sde): dang / rnam par brtag pa'i don no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod chos kyi rnam grang 'di la yang dag
179a3(mdo sde): par zhugs nas yun ji srid cig lon/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/
179a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ bajam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sa'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do// shwa ra
179a5(mdo sde): dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sa'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rig pa dang ma rig pa yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do// shA ra dwa
179a6(mdo sde): ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rig pa dang ma rig pa yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do// shA ra
179a7(mdo sde): dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad yun ji srid cig nas zhugs
179b1(mdo sde): pa srid do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag dang gtam bya ba'i nus pa ga la yod
179b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ khyi dang byi la thams cad dam/ wa thams cad kyis kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab gzhig par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dra ba'i nyan thos thams cad
179b3(mdo sde): kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i bstan pa gcig gi mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i bstan pa lta smos de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
179b4(mdo sde): bzang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bzhud la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos smra ba de dag la kun tu bsrung ba dang
179b5(mdo sde): yongs su bsrung ba mdzad par/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi chos kyi stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
179b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par bgyid pa/ chos smras pa de dag gi
179b7(mdo sde): yon tan gyi khyad par rnams bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal dge slong mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos smra ba de dag ni nga'i chos kyi sku la nges par 'byung bar
180a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyuraro// de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la nye bar 'gyur ro// de dag la bdung dang bdad kyi rigs kyi lha'i bum
180a2(mdo sde): lta ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gang su dag chos smras pa'i dge slong de la se gol gtogs pa gcig tsam srid cig mi byams pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni mir 'gyur ba
180a3(mdo sde): las kyang ring du gyur pa yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'jam dpal gzhan yang gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la ma dad pa'i sems bskyed pa de
180a4(mdo sde): dag ni so thags ngan par 'gyur/ lce dang sna med par 'gyur/ rkang lag phyi phyogs su 'gyur/ lus nang bu can du 'gyur/ mig med par 'gyur ro// shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur/
180a5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal 'di dag ni mi gti mug pa de dag gi skyon du 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal mdor bshad na/ de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ de dag gi spu'i khung bu re rer yang
180a6(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa 'jug go/ gal te mir skyes na yang rtag tu dmus long du 'gyur/ lce med par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
180a7(mdo sde): 'di spong ba de dag ni/ tshe 'di nyid la lus mdze can du 'gyur/ mchu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug par 'gyur/ lus zhom par 'gyur/ lus gcer bur 'gyur/ lus skam por 'gyur/ yi
180b1(mdo sde): dgas 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal gzhan yang mi gti mug pa de dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi gnas ni/ ngas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pas mkhyen to// 'jam dpa'
180b2(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal kha rog de
180b3(mdo sde): skad ma 'dri shig/ 'di la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos par 'gyur te/ skrag par 'gyur/ dngang bar 'gyur/ rab tu dngang bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ sems can/
180b4(mdo sde): 'di dag gis 'di lta bu thos nas/ slan cad nam yang dam pa'i chos spong bar mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan
180b5(mdo sde): bdas kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sa'i 'og na sems can dmyal ba yod pa'i ming la 'di lta ste/ tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / thig nag dang / kun tu 'bar dang / rab tu 'bar
180b6(mdo sde): dang / reg dka' dang / drag po dang mchu rnon dang / lcags kyi thu lum dang / lcags kyi be con dang / mun khung dang / mgo bstod dang / spyi'u tshugs dang spre'u gdong dang / rtag tu rab
180b7(mdo sde): 'bar dang / rul ba dang / rtag tu dring dang / rab 'joms dang / nges 'jom dang / shin tu gnod 'byung rnams te/ 'jam dpal mi gti mug pa de gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i sems ca
181a1(mdo sde): dmyal ba ni 'di dag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos sba/
181a2(mdo sde): ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po khyod kyis zhu ba de legs par zhus so// kun tu bzang po rigs kyi bu 'am/
