181a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo chos smra ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu brgyan par skye bar
181a4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mdzes pa sha stag go// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gnyis mngon du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
181a5(mdo sde): mdor na rigs kyi bu de'i phan yon ni grangs med/ dpag tu med de/ de dag ni bskal pa stong dag gis kyang brjod par mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan
181a6(mdo sde): 'das slad ma'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po 'di lta bu chos 'di
181a7(mdo sde): dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni phal cher rab tu byung ba dag 'byung ba ste/ 'di skad du 'di dag ni snyan dngags sbyar ba yin gyi 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin no// 'di
181b1(mdo sde): ngag ni rang bzor byas pa yin te/ mdo sde 'di dag ni sngon nam yang ma thos so zhes 'dzer cing de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ro// spangs nas kyang 'thol zhing 'chags par mi 'gyur te/ de dag
181b2(mdo sde): chos spangs pas 'chi ba'i tshe sems can dmyal ba kun tu 'bar ba mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ro/ / skyes ma thag tu lcags kyi 'khor los mi gti mug pa de dag gi mgo bcad nas sa la ltung bar 'gyur ro// de
181b3(mdo sde): ltar gyur nas kyang bskal pa mang po/ bskal pa brgya phrag mang po dang / bskal pa stong phrag mang por dmus long du 'gyur ro// gal te bskal pa brgya dag 'das nas mir skye bar gyur na yang tshe rabs thams
181b4(mdo sde): cad du dmus long du skye bar 'gyur zhing lce med pa dang / gdong phyin phyogs su 'dug pa dang / ltag sgur dang / mjid pa nub pa dang / rkang gyol dang / nga ro khyi skad lta bu dang / rtag tu bkres shing skoms
181b5(mdo sde): pas nyen pa dang / lus skams pa dang / kha mnam pa dang sems can thams cad kyis mthong ngam/ thos na yid du mi 'ong bar skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des
181b6(mdo sde): mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'tshal ba bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu dag spangs pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la khros pa'i sems kyis bltas par gyur pa rnams nongs pa la nongs par
181b7(mdo sde): 'chags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar byis par gyur pa dang / ji ltar rmongs par gyur pa dang / ji ltar shes rab 'chal par gyur pa dang / ji ltar blo chung bar gyur pa rnams 'chags shing mchis
182a1(mdo sde): na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/ de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang /
182a2(mdo sde): dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag spangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di thos nas rab tu spangs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
182a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ khyed kyis skrag par bya ba'i rigs so// grogs po dag nga thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsnyes pa yin na/ nga nyid kyang skrag na/
182a4(mdo sde): gang dag nga'i slob ma rnams lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu dag chos 'di ni zab pa ste/ de ni mi 'am mi ma yin pa 'am/ lha 'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ sus kyang rnam par dkrug par mi nus na/ dge
182a5(mdo sde): sbyong ngam/ bram ze gzhan dag gis lta ga la nus te ci smos/ rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa ste/ rigs kyi bu dag dper na/ dkon mchog za ma
182a6(mdo sde): tog ji lta bar mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni legs
182a7(mdo sde): par gsungs pa legs so/ / bcom ldan 'das dge slong de lta bu de dag gis dad pas stsal ba ji ltar yongs su 'ju bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bajam dpal gang dag chos kyi
182b1(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di spong ba dang / chos smra ba de dag la mi byams pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni nyi ma gcig gam/ se gol gtogs pa gcig srid tsam zhig dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad pa'am/ tha na dge
182b2(mdo sde): 'dun la phul ba'i sa la mchil ma thal cig 'dor du yang ngas ma gnang ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtsham
182b3(mdo sde): ma mchis pa lnga po dag 'di dang nye ba lags sam ring ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas brtan shwa ra dwa tI'i bu kha rog de skad ma 'dri shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu mtsham
182b4(mdo sde): med pa snga po dag ni bla'i/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs pa ni nam yang de lta ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu mtshams med pa lnga byed pa ni mtshams med pa lnga po dag myur du zad par byas nas mir skye bar 'gyur ro//
182b5(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag de ni nam yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par mi 'gyur te/ de ni bdag kyang phung la gzhan yang phung bar byed par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
182b6(mdo sde): bu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so/ / e ma 'o dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal lo// las kyi sgrib pa 'di lta bu dag ni bdag gis rmi lam na yang mthong bar ma
182b7(mdo sde): gyur cig/ / bam po gsum pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de snyam ma/
183a1(mdo sde): sems shig/ ngas chos bstan pa ni 'byung ba dang bcas pa yin na/ 'jig rten ni las bdag gir bya ba/ rang gi las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/ rang gi las brtan par bya ba ste/ sems
183a2(mdo sde): can dag rang rang gi las rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyis tshor ba myong gi/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma lan no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni dge legs su 'gro ba'i lam bshad de/ bde bar 'gro ba dang / 'jigs
183a3(mdo sde): pa med par 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba dang / 'chi ba med par 'gro ba'i lam bshad na/ bon kyang sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/
183a4(mdo sde): yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan zhing 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dang / log par lta ste/ log par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song
183a5(mdo sde): ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas ni ma lan no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can thams cad la nga'i snying rje 'di lta bu skye ste/ ngas sems can
183a6(mdo sde): gcig gi don du yang bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong bar bya'i/ sems can gcig po ni yongs su btang bar mi bya'o snyam ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i
183a7(mdo sde): bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni de 'dra'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig la bu gcig pa gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig
183b1(mdo sde): yod la/ de rkyen 'ga' zhig dang phrad nas/ 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na/ mi de bu la sems pas sdug bsngal zhig yid mi bde bar gyur te ngu zhing smre sngags 'don to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs/
183b2(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can sdug bsngal ba dag la bu cig pa bzhin du dgongs pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag nyon mongs pa rnams dang / lhan cig gnas
183b3(mdo sde): pa ni ma yin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gnas so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dag kyang nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi
183b4(mdo sde): gnas so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo'i tshogs chen po mngon par sprul te/ bya ba dag ston kyang bya ba de dag ni
183b5(mdo sde): yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas te/ ma skyes ma 'gags shing 'gags par mi 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad
183b6(mdo sde): cing / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa yang ston te mdzad pa ston kyang spyod pa de dag ni yod pa ma yin no// dper na nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med pa'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
183b7(mdo sde): sku la yang rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med pa'o/ / 'on kyang sems can rnams dang mthun par de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthun par mdzad de/ sems can rnams ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du
184a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthun par 'jug go/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa/
184a2(mdo sde): la bsnyel ba mi mnga'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu nga ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / rab dang / mchog dang / phul dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
184a3(mdo sde): pa yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshig smras pa 'di ni bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa'o// rab tu byung ba 'am/ khyim pa'ang rung ste/ sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag thams cad ni sems can dmyal
184a4(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dag rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di thos nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
184a5(mdo sde): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag gis ni rnyed pa nongs par rnyed do// gang dag chos kyis rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba de dag gi lce ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur ba lags bcom ldan 'das/
184a6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de dag gi lce ni dpag tshad 'bum par 'gyur te/ de la lcags kyi thong gshol 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba me lce
184a7(mdo sde): gcig tu gyur pa bye ba phrag lnga brgyas rmo bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ngag ma bsrungs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor mi gti mug pa de dag gis las kyi sgrib pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro//
184b1(mdo sde): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ni rmad du byung ba chen po lags so zhes ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas
184b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos smra ba'i dge slong de dag phrag pa la bkur bar bgyi'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
184b3(mdo sde): spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyi'o// gdugs lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du phyag bgyi'o// bsnyen bkur bgyi'o// bsti stang bgyi'o// bla mar bgyi'o// ri mor
184b4(mdo sde): bgyi'o/ / mchod par bgyi'o// brjed par bgyi'o// gsol bar bgyi'o// bsti stang bgyi ba dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / gus pas bsrung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ de dag ni bcom
184b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi sras te chos kyi sku las nges par 'byung ba'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bur gyur pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes
184b6(mdo sde): pa blta na sdug pa de ni 'og ma thams cad kyis mchod pa'i 'os dang phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so/ / de bzhin du chos smra ba de dag kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa'i 'os dang phyag bgyi
184b7(mdo sde): ba'i 'os lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyis bu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis chos smra/
185a1(mdo sde): pa'i dge slong de dag snying las rgyung ngur bya ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / kun tu bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa'i phyir tshig 'di legs par smras so// byang chub sems dpa'/

185a3(mdo sde): legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/ / dpag tshad brgya khor yug tu yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la rigs kyi bu tshig 'di legs pa smras pa

185a5(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs rab mdzes mchog rab tshig ldan pa/ shin tu dri med bzhin ldan khyod kyi bsam pa mchog/ yon tan rin chen mi mnyam mnyam pa'i tshig legs smras/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la
185a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos du dang ldan na/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/

185b1(mdo sde): lta ste/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'o// kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi chos gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phrag dog med pa dang / rlom sems
185b2(mdo sde): med pa ste/ kun tu bzang po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi chos gnyis so// kun tu bzang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la
185b3(mdo sde): dbang po gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par 'tshe ba bskyed par mi bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan
185b4(mdo sde): brjod pa 'di bshad pa dang / dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi khyad par gyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu las sems can dpag tu med pas gzungs thob par gyur to//
185b5(mdo sde): dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi khyad par gyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
185b6(mdo sde): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
185b7(mdo sde): ni zab lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/ gzugs zab pa'i phyir zab bo// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir
186a1(mdo sde): zab bo/ / stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir zab bo// nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir zab bo// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong de bzhin
186a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa las mngon du thos na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nam yang ma thos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shin tu thos par bya dka' ba yin no// kun dga'
186a3(mdo sde): bos gsol pa/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe/ sems can mang po dag sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs
186a4(mdo sde): 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs zin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ngas chos smra ba de dag kyang byin
186a5(mdo sde): gyis brlabs so/ / kun dga' bo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba de ni mig na bar mi 'gyur/ lce na par mi 'gyur/ snun par mi 'gyur/ so na bar mi 'gyur/ lag pa dang rkang pa na bar
186a6(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ klad pa na bar mi 'gyur/ rna ba na bar mi 'gyur/ lus dman par mi 'gyur/ lus dri mi zhim par mi 'gyur/ pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de la mi dang mi ma yin pa
186a7(mdo sde): thams cad srung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de spros pa thams cad yongs su spangs nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom
186b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ bdud par chad mi bgyid pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo bdud thams cad chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad
186b2(mdo sde): byed mi nus te/ kun dga' bo gang gi tshe bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'chad pa la bar chad byed du 'gro'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig can gyis rang gi khyim kun tu
186b3(mdo sde): babar bar mthong ste/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de ltar zab bo// kun dga' bo sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur/ phyag bya ba'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro// kun
186b4(mdo sde): dga' bos gsol pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs gang na bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs de nyid na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang gnas par gyur la/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba'i slad du mchis
186b5(mdo sde): shing mchis nas kyang / sngar de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis nas slad kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag bgyis na nongs pa ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang gi/
186b6(mdo sde): tshe khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu bkol te nga la phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe khyod nyid nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / mchog
186b7(mdo sde): dang / dam pa yin mod kyi/ kun dga' bo ngas sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ phyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
187a1(mdo sde): pas gang las ting nge 'dzin rin chen dkon mchog ta la la bstan pa 'di gsan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gong na su mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo
187a2(mdo sde): mi'i 'jig rten dang / lha'i 'jig rten dang / dri za'i 'jig rten na nga'i gong na su yang med de/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes thogs

187a5(mdo sde): nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so// a la la chos/ a la la chos chos rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa a la

188b1(mdo sde): dus dus su bsti stang gyis shig/ rin po che'i sdong du chug la phrag la thogs shig/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dge slong sdig pa can de dag la yid ma rton cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni khyod la rjes su bstan pa'o//

188b7(mdo sde): pa la chags pa/ gtsug lag khang la chags pa/ gnas la chags pa/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos la chags pa/ khyim sun par byed pa/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa/ de dag 'byung ste/ kun
189a1(mdo sde): tu bzang po mi gti mug pa de lta bu dag gi don tu ngas mdo 'di yongs su gtad kyis mdo 'di nub par gyur ta re de nas phyogs bcu nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod
189a2(mdo sde): sbyin dang / dri za thams cad lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang thams cad 'dus shing tshogs te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar dang / dam
189a3(mdo sde): pa'i chos ji srid gnas kyi bar du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ / chos smra ba'i dge slong de la yang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bsti stang du bgyi'o// btsun par bgyi'o//

189a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag la yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ / yon tan pha rol phyin pa de dag gi/ yon tan kun bshad thams cad
189a6(mdo sde): nga las nyon/ / nga rgyal rgyags dang bag med spang byos la// dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis mnyan par gyis// ma ga d+ha 'dir shing dbang byang chub drung // rang byung mi yi seng ge bzhugs shes grags//
189a7(mdo sde): ting 'dzin rnam par thar pa mchog la gnas// shing rgyal chen po de yi drung na bzhugs// phyogs bcu'i zhing rdul snyed dang de thabs cig/ skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis dpa' bo bskor// sangs rgyas
189b1(mdo sde): phal chen zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin/ / ting 'dzin de la mi yi dbang po gnas// mi dbang de ni snyoms par zhugs rtogs nas// 'jam dpal gzhon nu shar gyi phyogs logs nas// sangs rgyas zhing /
189b2(mdo sde): bcu'i rdul snyed lhan cig tu// skyes bu dam pa rnams dang rgyal drung 'ongs// de bzhin sbyar te phyogs bcu'i zhing kun nas// sangs rgyas sras po dpal zhes bya ba kun// phyogs bcu'i zhing rdul
189b3(mdo sde): snyed dang lhan cig tu/ / skyes bu dam pa rnams dang lhags par gyur// der 'dus gyur nas 'jig rten phan 'dod pa// 'jam dpal grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams la// sems can dam pa
189b4(mdo sde): bzang po'i dpal gyis dris/ / sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod gang yon tan ci// de nas sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba// rnyog pa med pas byang chub yon tan dang // bden yangs yon tan ldan
189b5(mdo sde): gyi spyod yul gtsang / / sems can dam pa bzang po'i dpal la dris// sangs rgyas sras po rnams kyi spyod yul gtsang // rgyal bas bstan pa bdag gis 'dir spras kyis// khyod kyang sangs rgyas
189b6(mdo sde): sras kyi yon tan dang / / spyod pa gang dag yin pa brjod par gyis// bzang po'i dpal gyis spras pa rgyal sras nyon// yon tan mtha' yas ldan de'i yon tan las// dpe tshul cung zad tsam zhig brjod
189b7(mdo sde): par bya/ / rgya mtsho'i thigs pa bzhin du shin tu chung // byang chub gzhir 'gyur ba yi rang byung sems// thog ma nyid du bskyed pa gang yin pa// de yi yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas te// mtshungs med
190a1(mdo sde): kyis kyang yongs su brjod mi spyod/ / pha rol phyin dang sa yi yon tan rnams// bskal pa mang por spyad pa ci smos te// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gi/ yon tan
190a2(mdo sde): chu bo zad par mdzad mi spyod/ / yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyi yon tan las// dpe tshul cung zad tsam zhig brjod pa ste// mkha' la bya rjes 'dra bar chung ba dang // sa chen rnams las rdul phran gcig
190a3(mdo sde): dang mtshungs/ / byang chub yon tan gnas kyi sems skye ba// rgyu med ma yin gyi na ma yin gyi// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos dang dge 'dun la// dang dang dang ba bskyed nas sems skye ste// de ni 'dod dang
190a4(mdo sde): longs spyod rgyal srid dang / / bdag la bde dang snyan dang grags phyir min// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bya'i phyir// 'jig rten phan pa byed pa'i sems skye'o// rtag tu sems can phan pa bya phyir
190a5(mdo sde): dang / zhing rnams sbyong dang sangs rgyas mchod pa dang // chos yongs gzung dang sangs rgyas byang chub dang // ye shes rnam par sbyang phyir sems de skye// rgyal ba kun dang chos dang de bzhin du// 'phags/
190a6(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs la rtag tu dad pa dang // dang zhing mos dang gus pa rab bskyed nas// bla ma gus par mchod phyir sems de skye// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos la dang gyur cing // sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod la dang
190a7(mdo sde): byed la/ / byang chub bla na med la dad gyur nas// skyes bu chen po rnams kyi sems skye'o// dad pa'i stobs kyis mi bdag gyur pa rnams// bsam yas rgya chen mchod pas mchod byas shing // chos dang
190b1(mdo sde): de bzhin mi phyed dge 'dun la/ / bsam yas mchod pas mchod nas sems skye'o// dad pa sngon 'dren ma ltar skyed pa des// yon tan thams cad bsrung zhing 'phel bar byed// dogs pa sel cing
190b2(mdo sde): chu bo rnams las sgrol/ / dad pa bde ba'i grong khyer mtshon pa yin// dad pa rnyog pa med cing sems dang byed// nga rgyal spong zhing gus pa'i rtsa ba yin// dad pa gter dang nor dang rkang pa'i mchog/
190b3(mdo sde): lag pa bzhin du dge sdud rtsa ba yin// dad pa yongs su gtong la dga' bar byed// dad pa rgyal ba'i chos la rab dga' skyed// dad pa yon tan ye shes khyab par byed// sangs rgyas go 'phang
190b4(mdo sde): ston cing thob par byed/ / dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal bar byed// dad pa'i stobs la gzhan gyis mi brdzi zhing // nyon mongs rnam par sel ba'i gzhi rten yin// dad pa rang 'byung yon tan
190b5(mdo sde): rnams kyang tshol/ / dad pa chags pa'i sgo la chags pa med// mi dal spangs shing dal ba'i mchog cig yin// dad pa bdud kyi lam las 'da' byed cing // thar pa'i lam mchog ston par byed pa
190b6(mdo sde): yin/ / yon tan zhing gi sa bon ma rul ba// dad pa byang chub zhing ni rnam par skyed// ye shes khyab par yon tan 'phel bar byed// dad pa rgyal ba thams cad ston pa yin// dad pas mos pa'i khyad par
190b7(mdo sde): dga' rnams kyi/ / de la spyod pa rim gyis brjod par bya// 'di 'dra'i chos ni 'jig rten rab dkon te// rgya mtsho'i nang na rin chen rgyal po bzhin// gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dang gus pa// de dag tshul
191a1(mdo sde): khrims bslab pa yong mi 'dor/ / gang dag tshul khrims bslab pa mi 'dor ba// yon tan ldan de yon tan ldan pas bstod// tshul khrims byang chub sems ston byed pa ste//
191a2(mdo sde): slob pa'i sa yi yon tan rnams la sbyor// tshul khrims bslab pa 'dor bar mi byed pa// de dag rgyal bas bsngags pa'i 'os su 'gyur// gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dang gus pa// de dag rgyal la
191a3(mdo sde): mchod pa rgya chen byed/ / gang dag rgyal la mchod pa che byed pa// de dag sa ng+yas dad pa bsam mi lug// gang dag rtag tu chos la dang gus pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyan ngoms pa med// gang dag rgyal
191a4(mdo sde): ba'i chos nyan mi ngoms pa/ / de dag chos la mos pa bsam mi khyab// gang dag rtag tu dge 'dun dang gus pa// de dag mi ldog dge 'dun dad pa yin// gang dag mi ldog dge 'dun rab dad pa//
191a5(mdo sde): dag dad pa'i stobs kyis mi ldog 'gyur// gang dag dad pa'i stob kyis mi ldog pa// de dag dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal// gang dag dbang po rno zhing rab gsal ba// de dag sdig pa'i grogs po rnam
191a6(mdo sde): par sbas/ / gang dag sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pa// de dag chos ldan grogs kyis yongs su gzung // gang dag chos ldan grogs kyis yongs gzung ba// de dag dge ba rgya chen sogs par byed//
191a7(mdo sde): gang dag dge ba rgya chen sogs byed pa// bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyu stobs ldan// bdag nyid chen rgyu stobs gang ldan pa// de dag mos pa'i khyad par rgya chen 'gyur// gang dag mos pa'i khyab par rgya che ba/
191b1(mdo sde): de dag rgyal ba kun gyis rtag byin rlabs// gang dag rgyal ba kun gyis byin brlabs pa// de dag byang chub don tu sems kyang skye// gang dag byang chub don tu sems skye ba// de dag drang srong chen po'i yon tan
191b2(mdo sde): brtson/ / drang srong chen po'i yon tan gang brtson pa// de dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs su skye// gang dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs skyes pa// de dag mnyam zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor spangs// mnyam
191b3(mdo sde): zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor gang spangs pa/ / de dag dad dang bsam pa rnam par dag/ gang dag dang dang bsam pa rnam dag pa// de dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa mchog/ gang dag lhag bsam dam pa mchog ldan
191b4(mdo sde): pa/ / de dag rtag tu pha rol phyin pa spyod// gang dag rtag tu pha rol phyin spyod pa// de dag theg pa chen po 'di la zhugs// gang dag theg pa chen po 'dir bzhugs pa// de dag sangs rgyas rnams la sgrub
191b5(mdo sde): pas mchod/ / gang dag sgrub pas sangs rgyas mchod byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas rjes su dran mi phyed// gang dag sangs rgyas rjes dran mi phyed pa// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong //
191b6(mdo sde): gang dag sangs rgyas bsam yas rtag mthong ba// de la nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min// gang dag nam yang sangs rgyas mi zhugs min// de dag par skabs chos las nyams mi 'gyur// gang
191b7(mdo sde): dag par skabs chos las mi nyams pa/ / de dag spobs pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur// gang dag spobs pa sgrib pa med gyur pa// de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yas 'gyur// gang dag chos rab ston pa mtha'
192a1(mdo sde): yas pa/ / de dag 'gro la byams shing phan par 'dod// gang dag 'gro la byams shing phan 'dod pa// de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba brtan// gang dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa brtan pa//
192a2(mdo sde): de dag chos dga' dga' ba'i dbang por 'gyur// gang dag chos dga' dga' ba'i dbang po can// de dag 'dus byas skyon gyis yal bar bor// gang dag 'dus byas skyon gyis yal bor ba// de dag nga rgyal
192a3(mdo sde): rgyags med bag med min/ / gang dag nga rgyal rgyags med bag med min// de dag rtag tu bdag dang gzhan don brtson// gang dag rtag tu bdag gzhan don brtson pa// de dag 'khor bar yongs su skyo ba
192a4(mdo sde): med/ / gang dag 'khor bar yongs su mi skyo ba// de dag rtun pa dam pa mchog dang ldan// gang dag rtun pa dam pa mchog ldan pa// de dag mngon shes rnam par dag pa skyes// gang dag mngon shes
192a5(mdo sde): rnam par dag skyes pa/ / de dag 'gro ba'i spyod pa mang po rtogs// gang dag 'gro ba'i spyod pa mang rtogs pa// de dag 'gro ba yongs su smin byed mkhas// 'gro ba yongs su smin byed gang mkhas pa// de dag
192a6(mdo sde): 'gro ba sdud shes cho ga mkhas/ / 'gro ba sdud shes chog su mkhas pa// de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson// gang dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhir brtson pa// de dag 'gro ba'i don ni mtha' yas byed// gang
192a7(mdo sde): dag 'gro don mtha' yas byed gyur pa/ / de dag shes rab thabs la rten pa yin// gang dag shes rab thabs la rten gyur pa// dpa' bo de dag bla med lam la gnas// dpa' bo gang dag bla med lam gnas pa//
192b1(mdo sde): de dag bdud dpung rnams kyis yongs mi tshugs// gang dag bdud dpung rnams kyis mi tshugs pa// de dag bdud kyi lam las rab tu 'das// gang dag bdud kyi lam las rab 'das pa// de dag mi ldog pa ni
192b2(mdo sde): rjes su thob/ / gang dag mi ldog ma ni thob gyur pa// de dag mi skye bzod pa thob pa yin// gang dag mi skye bzod pa thob gyur pa// 'jig rten sgron de rgyal bas lung bstan to// 'jig rten sgron gang rgyal bas lung
192b3(mdo sde): bstan pa/ / de dag rgyal ba kun dang mngon sum gnas// rgyal ba kun dang mngon du su gnas pa// de dag rgyal gsang rnam 'phrul cho ga mkhas// rgyal gsang rnam 'phrul cho ga su mkhas pa// de dag rgyal ba
192b4(mdo sde): kun gyis dgongs pa yin/ / gang dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs gyur pa// de dag yon tan kun gyis legs par brgyan// gang dag yon tan kun gyis legs brgyan pa// de dag bsod nams dam pas lus
192b5(mdo sde): kyang sbyangs/ / bsod nams mchog gis gang lus rnam sbyangs pa// de dag gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar 'bar// gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar ba// de dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams rdzogs// gang
192b6(mdo sde): dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rdzogs pa/ / de dag lus rnams dpe byad bzang pos spras// gang dag lus rnams dpe byad bzang spras pa// de dag lus kyi 'od ni mtha' yas so// gang dag lus kyi 'od ni
192b7(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa/ / de dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam mi khyab// gang dag bong bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de dag 'od las pad+ma rnams kyang 'byung // gang dag bong las pad+ma rnams byung ba// de dag rgyal gzugs
193a1(mdo sde): pad+ma'i gdan 'khod par/ / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag tu ston byed cing // don yod gnas pa sems can 'dul bar byed// gang dag rgyal gzugs pad+ma'i gdan 'khod par/
193a2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag tu ston byed cing // don yod gnas pa sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas so// gang dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa// de
193a3(mdo sde): dag bsam gyis mi khyab zhing rgyu zhing / / bsam gyis mi khyab chos rnams ston par byed// sems can bsam gyis mi khyab tshim par byed// gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing // sems can
193a4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab tshim byed pa/ / de dag so so rigs shes stobs rnams kyis// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// gang dag so so rig shes stobs rnams kyis// bsam pa ji
193a5(mdo sde): bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/ / de dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid// ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing rjes su 'brang // gang dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid// ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing rjes 'brang
193a6(mdo sde): ba/ / de dag smon lam stobs kyis ci 'dod par// sems can rgyud na gzugs ni ston par byed// gang dag smon lam stobs kyis ci 'dod par// sems can chung na gzugs ni sngon byed pa// de
193a7(mdo sde): ngag tshig rnams rjod par byed pa'i tshe/ / dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam yas sgra 'byung ngo // gang dag tshig rnams rjod par byed pa'i tshe// dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam yas sgra 'byung ba// de dag 'gro ba
193b1(mdo sde): ma lus kun gyis sems/ / skad cig gcig la sems kyis rnam par shes// gang dag 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems// skad cig gcig la sems kyis rnam shes pa// de dag nam yang mi 'chi skye
193b2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ / nyon mongs rgyu ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin// gang dag nam yang mi 'chi mi skye zhing // nyon mongs rgyu ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba// de dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus// chos kyis rab
193b3(mdo sde): tu phye bas 'jig rten rgyu/ / gang dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus// chos kyis rab phye 'jig rten rgyu byed pa// de dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu dang // pha rol phyin dang rnam thar mchog la gnas//
193b4(mdo sde): gang dag sa bcu rnams dang dbang bcu dang // pha rol phyin dang rnam thar mchog gnas pa// de dag dbang skur bkod dang rnam 'phrul dang // ting 'dzin mchog la gnas pa rjes su thob// gang dag dbang bskur
193b5(mdo sde): bkod dang rnam 'phrul dang / / ting 'dzin mchog la gnas pa rjes thob pa// de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las// dbang bskur thams cad ma lus nod par byed// gang dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal
193b6(mdo sde): ba thams cad las/ / dbang bskur thams cad ma lus nod byed pa// de dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// phyag mthil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bskur to// gang dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs
193b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyis/ / phyag mthil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bskur ba// mthu brtan de dag nam mkha' lta bur ni// ma lus khyab byas phyogs rnams kun na gnas// mthu brtan gang dag nam mkha' lta bur ni// ma
194a1(mdo sde): lus khyab byas phyogs rnams kun gnas pa/ / mtshungs med de dag spyod yul lhar bcas kyi// 'jig rten rnams kyis shes par yongs mi nus// mtshungs med gang dag spyod
194a2(mdo sde): yul lhar bcas kyi/ / 'jig rten rnams kyis shes par mi nus pa// de dag rtun pa kun dang mthong ba dang // ming thos pa dang spobs pa don yod do// gang dag rtun pa kun dang thong ba dang // ming thos pa
194a3(mdo sde): dang spobs pa don yod pa/ / skyes chen de dag sbyin pa sbyin byed kyi// sbyin pa thams cad don yod 'gyur ba yin// skyes bu dam pa de dag rnams kyi mthus// chos kyang gnas shing byams pa nyams mi 'gyur/
194a4(mdo sde): dge ba'i las lam rab tu spyod 'gyur te// dkon mchog mthu yang dam pa mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje 'khrig pa'i rin chen mchog yod pa// de yi mthu yis rgya mtshor rin chen rnams// mi zad mi 'grib
194a5(mdo sde): 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/ / de bzhin yon tan mtha' yas yon tan chu// gang na sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing gyur pa// der ni byang chub rnam par sangs rgyas ston// phyogs rnams gang ni chos kyang med
194a6(mdo sde): gyur pa/ / phyogs der chos kyi gter ni ston par byed// de dag rtog med rnam par mi rtogs cing // de dag lhun gyis grub par phyogs kun tu// zla ba lta bur snang ba rab ston cing // thabs stong
194a7(mdo sde): ngag gis sems can 'dul bar byed/ / de dag skad cig re la phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten kun tu byang chub sangs rgyas ston// 'khor lo skor dang mya ngan 'das zhing dang // ring bsrel rab tu rgyas
194b1(mdo sde): pa'ang dpa' bo ston/ / mkhas pa de dag nyan thos rang rgyalas// sangs rgyas bkod pa rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa// bskal pa bsam mi khyab par ston byed cing // theg gsum sgo nas sems can
194b2(mdo sde): 'dul bar byed/ / mos pa kun gyi bsgrub pa shes pa rnams// khye'u dang bu mo bud med lus rnams dang // lha mi lha min klu dang gnod sbyin dang // grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs rnams ston//
194b3(mdo sde): / rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin gyi sgos// dpa' bo de dag 'gro ba'i gzugs spyod dang // rtags dang spyod dang sgra skad 'jug pa dag/ ji snyed thams cad ma lus ston par byed// de dag zhing bkod bsam
194b4(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pas/ / phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun la mchod par byed// gang dag zhing bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pas// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun la mchod byed pa// de dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam
194b5(mdo sde): yas shing / / sems can 'grel pa'i ye shes mtha' yas so// gang dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam yas shing // sems can 'grel pa'i ye shes mtha' yas pa// de dag lus dang ngag gi rnam
194b6(mdo sde): 'phrul dang / / yid kyis rnam par 'phrul pa bsam mi khyab// gang dag lus dang ngag gi rnam 'phrul dang // yid kyi rnam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam 'phrul dang //
194b7(mdo sde): bzod dang brtson 'grus rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// gang dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam 'phrul dang // bzod brtson rnam 'phrul bsam gyi mi khyab pa// de dag sangs rgyas phal chen ting 'dzin sgos//
195a1(mdo sde): bsam gtan rnam par 'phrul dang shes rab dang // thabs dang mngon shes rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// yon tan kun gyis rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas// de dag phra rab rdul
195a2(mdo sde): 'jug ting nge 'dzin/ / rdul rnams kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing // rdul cig steng na zhing rnams bsam mi khyab// ston par byed kyang rdul la 'phel ba med// rdul de'i steng du sangs rgyas bcas zhing
195a3(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing yang kha cig ston// nyon mongs rnam dag dog pa kha cig dang // yangs shing phra dang che ba'i zhing yang ston// zhing rnams la la 'jig dang 'chags pa dang // la la
195a4(mdo sde): steng g.yogs med dang mthun pa dang / / la la tshol pa smig rgyu lta bu dang // la la mig 'phrul lta bur gyur pa rnams// ji ltar rdul gcig steng du ston byed pa// de bzhin rdul rnams ma lus kun la ston
195a5(mdo sde): drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra ste/ / grags pa mtha' yas rnam thar 'di 'dra'o// de dag rgyal mchod rnam 'phrul ting nge 'dzin// rgyal ba kun la mngon par grub byed cing // lag pa'i mthil du
195a6(mdo sde): stong gsum rgyas bkang ste/ / skyes bu chen po rnams la mchod pa byed// phyogs bcu dag na me tog phreng ba dang // spos byug rin chen rin chen ji snyed pa// de dag byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa yi//
195a7(mdo sde): rgyal rnams mchod phyir lag pa'i mthil nas byin// gos dang phye ma rin chen ji snyed dang // rgyal mtshan pa dan gdugs mchog sna tshogs dang // gser gyis brgyan pa'i rin chen bla re rnams/
195b1(mdo sde): de dag lag pa'i mthil nas char du 'bebs// phyogs bcu dag na yo byad mtha' yas gang // drang srong chen po rnams la mchod 'os pa// de dag lag pa'i mthil nas char 'bebs shing // byang
195b2(mdo sde): / chub shing drung bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba mchod// phyogs rnams dag na rol mo ji snyed pa// rnga dang rdza rnga sgra snyan pi bang dang // sil snyan sgra dang sgra chen gling bu rnams// de dag lag pa'i mthil nas
195b3(mdo sde): rab tu sgrogs/ / phyogs bcu kun gyis dpe zla med rnams kyi// yang dag yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs dang // bstod pa'i tshigs bcad bsgrub pa sna tshogs pa// de dag lag pa'i mthil
195b4(mdo sde): nas rab tu sgrogs/ / 'od zer gang dag las dge sa yongs bsags pa// lag pa g.yas nas yongs su 'gyed byed cing // spos chus rgyal ba'i zhing rnams thams cad du// 'debs shing 'jig
195b5(mdo sde): rten sgron ma rnams la mchod/ / 'od zer bkod dang ldan pa mdzes pa'i 'od// pad+ma'i rgyan phreng bsam yas rab 'chang ba// pad+ma mtshan rab gzugs can du ma dag/ lag nas rgyal ba rnams la
195b6(mdo sde): mchod pa byed/ / me tog phal chen me tog bla re dang // me tog bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// bdug pa
195b7(mdo sde): phal chen bdug pa'i bla re dang / / bdug pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// bdug pa sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// phal chen spos dang spos kyi
196a1(mdo sde): bla re dang / / spos kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// sna tshogs spos rnams kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// 'phreng ba phal chen
196a2(mdo sde): 'phreng ba'i bla re dang / / 'phreng ba bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// 'phreng ba sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// phye ma phal chen phye ma'i bla re dang /
196a3(mdo sde): phye ma bkod pa'i bod zer rab bkye ste// phye ma sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// na bza' phal chen na bza'i bla re dang // na bza' bkod pa'i 'od zer
196a4(mdo sde): rab bkye ste/ / na bza' sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// phal chen gdugs dang gdugs kyi bla re dang // gdugs kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/
196a5(mdo sde): sna tshogs gdugs rnams kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// rin chen phal chen rin chen bla re dang // rin chen bkod pa'i bor zer rab bkye ste// rin chen sna tshogs
196a6(mdo sde): kun tu bkram byas shing / / bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// pad+ma phal chen pad+ma'i bla re dang // pad+ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// pad+ma sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid
196a7(mdo sde): chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ / rgyan 'phreng 'phel chen rgyan 'phreng bla re dang // rgyan 'phreng bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// rgyan 'phreng sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag
196b1(mdo sde): rgyal ba mchod/ / rgyal mtshan mchog bkod 'od zer rab bkye ste// de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang // sngo dang rgyal mtshan bkod pa sna tshogs pa// du mas rgyal ba'i zhing rnams brgyan
196b2(mdo sde): ba byed/ / nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs bkod pa'i gdugs// dar gyi lnga ldi pa dan rab sbyangs shing // dril g.yer dra ba rgyal ba'i gsung sgrogs pa// de bzhin gshegs kyi dbu la de dag 'dzin/
196b3(mdo sde): lag pa'i mthil nas mchod pa bsam yas rnams// rgyal ba gcig la de dag byed pa ltar// rgyal ba ma lus kun la'ang de bzhin te// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag 'gro ba sdud
196b4(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes kyis/ / rnam par 'phrul dang ting 'dzin mchog bsgrubs shing // bya ba dag dang bsnyen bkur kun gyi sgo// thabs stong dag gis sems can 'dul bar byed// kha cig de bzhin gshegs
196b5(mdo sde): pa mchod sgo dang / / sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong sgo dang // sbyangs pa'i yon tan tshul khrims kun sgo dang // bzod pa mi zad mi 'khrugs sgo dag dang // kha cig brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson
196b6(mdo sde): sgo dang / / bsam gtan rab tu zhi bar gnas sgo dang // don la rnam nges shes rab sgo rnams dang // spyod pa kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang // tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag dang mngon shes sgo// bsdu
196b7(mdo sde): ba'i dngos pos phan par 'dod sgo dang / / bsod nams bsags dang ye shes sgo dag dang // bden dang brten dang rnam par thar sgo dang // kha cig stobs dang dbang po lam sgo dang // nyan thos theg
197a1(mdo sde): pas rnam par sgrol sgo dang / / rkyen gyi theg pas rnam par dag sgo dang // theg pa mchog gi rnam par 'phrul sgo dang // kha cig mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal sgo// kha cig bdag
197a2(mdo sde): med srog med sgo dag dang / / mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags bral sgo dang // zhi 'gog ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo yis 'dul// 'gro ba'i spyod pa'i sgo rnams ji snyed pa// de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs
197a3(mdo sde): ste/ de dag kun tu rnam thar sgo dag nas// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// gang dag kun tu rnam thar sgo dag nas// bsam bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag
197a4(mdo sde): sus kyang mtshan mar gzung mi nus/ / ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa de 'dra'o// de dag dga' ba dkod pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs smin mthun byed pa// dga' bde spro ba rab
197a5(mdo sde): dga' kun ldan pas/ / bsams pa bstan nas sems can 'dul bar byed// gang du lo nyes 'jig rten yod byang gang // bde byed thams cad rab tu dkon 'gyur ba// der ni kun gyis bsams bzhin bya/
197a6(mdo sde): ba yis// sbyin pa sbyin zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed// de dag zas skom mchog dang ro mchog dang // gos dang bgo ba rin chen sna tshogs dang // rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs gtong bas// sbyin
197a7(mdo sde): la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul bar byed/ / brtan pa de dag mtshan mchog lus spras shing // gos dang rgyan mchog bgos shing brgyan byas te// 'phreng bas spyad cing spos kyis bskus pa yi// gzugs
197b1(mdo sde): rnams bstan pas sems can 'dul bar byed/ / mthong na dga' tshim rab tu dga' rnams la// blo mchog de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang ba// gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston
197b2(mdo sde): byed cing / / gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul bar byed// de dag ka la bing+ka'i sgra snyan dang // khu byug kun la ngang pa'i sgra skad dang // rnga dang tshangs dang mi 'am ci yi sgras// mos pa kun la/
197b3(mdo sde): de bzhin chos kyang ston// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gang yin pas// rgyal ba gang dag 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i// chos kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can
197b4(mdo sde): 'dul/ / de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed// don dang gnod pa'i grogs kyang de bzhin byed// bya ba kun la grogs su 'gyur byas shing // grogs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul bar
197b5(mdo sde): byed/ sdug bsngal gnod pa 'dus byas skyon gyi rnams// grogs kyi don du de dag bzod byed cing // 'gro ba kun la phan don bde don tu// de dag grogs don gnod pa dang du len// gang na mngon/
197b6(mdo sde): 'byung med cing chos med de// dgon par 'gro dang thar pa mi dmigs pa// der ni rgyal srid 'byor pa rab spangs te// zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung // de dag khyim dang 'ching dang
197b7(mdo sde): sred pa'i nas/ / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir// 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par// mngon par 'byung zhing thag pa rab tu rjod// de dag spyod pa bcu rnams rjod byed cing //
198a1(mdo sde): skyes chen rnams kyis chos spyod gang yin dang // drang srong rnams kyi spyod gun ma lus par// yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed// gang na sems can dpag med tshe
198a2(mdo sde): ldan zhing / / bde dang ldan la nyon mongs chung yod pa// dir ni rga bas nyen cing nad pu can// bdag la dbang med 'chi ba'i dbang gyur ston// 'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang rab 'bar la// 'jig
198a3(mdo sde): rten gti mug me chen rab 'bar zhing / / rga dang na dang 'chi ba rab 'bar ba'i// 'jig rten bstan nas sems can 'dul bar byed// de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu brtson bzhi dang // chos kyi khyad par
198a4(mdo sde): bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang / / sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag nyid rjod byed cing // sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis 'gro don byed// de dag kun brjod rdzu 'phrul rjes bstan pas// zugs kyi byin rlabs
198a5(mdo sde): stobs kyis thams cad du/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing // rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul// de dag thabs tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// 'jig rten rgyu
198a6(mdo sde): zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed/ / 'jig rten mi chags chu la pad+ma bzhin// dga' zhing dad par byed la rnam par rgyu// de dag snyan dngags mkhan rgyal snyan dngags sbyor// gar mkhan rnga mkhan gying
198a7(mdo sde): dang rol mo mkhan/ / zhags mdzes rgyan 'phreng thogs shing gar byed dang // sgyu ma mkhan po gzugs med kun tu ston// grong pa grong dpon kha lo sgyur ba 'gyur// de bzhin ded dpon tshong dpon
198b1(mdo sde): khyim bdag 'gyur/ / rgyal po blon po mdun 'don po nya dang // sman pa 'jigs med bstan bcos cho ga mkhas// de dag dgon par ljon shing chen por 'gyur// sman dang rin chen mi zad gter rnam
198b2(mdo sde): dang / / yid bzhin nor bu 'dod 'byin sdong po dang // lam gol dong ba rnams la lam ston 'gyur// 'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cing // sems can las kyi tshul rnams mi shes pa// de
198b3(mdo sde): dag kun la rmongs chos tshong thabs dang / / sna tshogs bzo rnams 'jig rten brjod par byed// 'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba gang // sems can bde byed mkhas pas rab bsngags pa/
198b4(mdo sde): rig stobs sman dang bstan bcos sna tshogs kun// drang srong de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod// gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten mos 'gyur ba// drang srong spyod mchog dam pa gang yin dang // brtul
198b5(mdo sde): zhugs dka' spyad dka' thub mchog kun kyang / / mkhas pa de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod// de dag spyod can kun rgyu mu stegs can// gdung ba go'u ta ma dang mi smar spyod// cer bu gos med
198b6(mdo sde): lhur len dge sbyong la/ / mu stegs can gyi slob dpon mkhas par ston// de dag kun tu 'tsho ba'i chos 'dzin dang // bla na yod dang bla na med rnams dang // ral pa ring dang gzhon nu'i brtul zhugs can//
198b7(mdo sde): de dag tu yang slob dpon 'gyur ba yin// nyi ma'i rjes lha dka' thub lnga ldan dang // khyi dang ba glang brtul zhugs ri dgas spyod// gle'u can dag dang mu stegs sum cu pa// de dag tu yang de dag
199a1(mdo sde): slob dpon 'gyur/ / lha ye shes la 'jug pa dga' rnams dang // mu stegs nye reg yul du rgyu rnams su// rtsa ba 'bras bu chu spyod gyur nas kyang // bsam yas chos la de dag
199a2(mdo sde): dam pa mchog/ cog pur 'dug dang gcig pu rgyu ba dang // tsher ma rdza dang thal bar nyal ba dang // gang dag gtun shin mal can gnas pa dang // de dag tu yang de dag slob dpon 'gyur// pha rol
199a3(mdo sde): mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa/ / de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas shing // bstan dka' mi bzang drag shul dka' thub kyis// mu stegs can gyi sdug bsngal spang bar 'dul/ 'jig rten
199a4(mdo sde): lta bas 'khrugs pa shes byas nas/ / lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu stegs can// kun la phra ba'i gzhi dang thabs tshul gyis// de dag rnams la bden pa ston par byed// la lar 'gro lding pa yi sngags
199a5(mdo sde): kyi gzhi/ / shin tu gsang ba'i gzhi yis bden pa ston// la la dag la gsal zhing drang tshig gis// la la dag la lha yi gsang tshig gis// la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig dang // don la rnam nges rdo
199a6(mdo sde): rje'i tshig rnams dang / / rgol ba 'dul ba shes pa'i tshig rnams dang // bstan bcos thub med thar pa'i tshig rnams kyis// la la dag la mi skad tshig rnams dang // kun la 'jug pa'i tshig nges tshig
199a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis/ / la la dag la lha tshig nges tshig dang // klu yi nges tshig gnod sbyin nges tshig gis// la la srin po 'byung po sha za dang // dri za grul bum lto 'phye chen tshig dang // mi tsi lha min mkha'
199b1(mdo sde): / rdzing tshig rnams kyis// bden pa bstan cig thar par 'dren pa byed// de dag bden dang nges tshig tshul shes te// de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i// chos nyid bsam yas tshig lam shes
199b2(mdo sde): pas ston/ / de dag ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// / bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma/ de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting nge 'dzin// 'gro ba kun la
199b3(mdo sde): mngon par sgrub byed cing / / 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye ste// 'od zer bkye nas sems can 'dul bar byed// mthong na legs pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can ji skad
199b4(mdo sde): bod zer de shes pa/ / de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te// bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog gi rgyu// mi rnams kun la sangs rgyas yongs bstan cing // chos kyang yongs su bstan te lam
199b5(mdo sde): bstan cing / / rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten bstan byas pas// des na mthong lags 'od zer grub par 'gyur// lha yi 'od zer zil gyis gnon pa yi// bod zer 'od byed ces bya rab gtong zhing
199b6(mdo sde): rdul dang mun pa thams cad bsal byas te/ / 'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab tu sdang // sems can gang dag 'ong nges bskul byas pa// de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir sgron ma 'dzin// de dag rgyal ba mchod
199b7(mdo sde): phyir smon bzung bas/ / 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur// 'bru mar mar me mar gyi mar me dang // rtswa shing 'dam bu 'ong ma'i sgron ma dang // spos dang bcud len rin chen sgron ma
200a1(mdo sde): dag/ rgyal ba rnams la phul nas bod byed thob// sgrol zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od nges bskul byas pa// de dag sreng yangs srid
200a2(mdo sde): pa'i rgya mtsho las/ / sems can bsgral ba'i don tu go ca gyon// gang dag sred yangs srid pa'i rgya mtsho las// sems can bsgral ba'i don du go gyon pa// de dag chu bo bzhi las rab tu sgrol//
200a3(mdo sde): mya ngan med pa bde ba'i grong khyer ston// stegs dang zam pa du ma byas pa dang // chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i grub 'byin te// 'dus byas sum phyung zhi ba bsngags byas pas// des na sgrol ba'i
200a4(mdo sde): 'od zer grub par 'gyur/ / skom pa sel ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs shing // chos la mos pa'i ro ni don
200a5(mdo sde): tu gnyer/ / 'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs te// chos mos ro la don tu gnyer gyur pas// bdud rtsi char pa 'bebs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// 'jig rten skom pa'i srid pa rnam par sel//
200a6(mdo sde): rdzirdzi dang chu klung khron pa chu dngango dang // mtsho rnams byang chub don tu byed btsud de// 'dod pa smad cing bsam gtan bsngags byas pas// des na srid bsrel ba grub par gyur// dga' bar byed pa'i
200a7(mdo sde): 'od zer rab gtong zhing / / sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// dga' bas rgyas shing byang chub mchog don tu// rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do// thugs rje ldan pa'i
200b1(mdo sde): su gzugs mtshan brgyan pa/ / pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa rnams byas shing // rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan rnams brjod pas// des na dga' byed 'od zer grub par gyur// mgu bar byed
200b2(mdo sde): pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / / sems can gang dgra bod des bskul byas pa// rtag tu sangs rgyas la ni dga' mgu zhing // chos la dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgu'o// de dag rtag tu
200b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dga' mgu zhing / / chos la dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgu nas// sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams dang // rtag tu 'grogs thob bzod pa bla med thob// sangs
200b4(mdo sde): rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs mchog la/ / sems can mang po bskul cing dran byas la// byang chub sems kyi yon tan rab brjod pas// des na mgu byed 'od zer grub par 'gyur// bsod nam
200b5(mdo sde): bsags pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / / sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer cing // sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma sbyin par byed// gtan pa med pa'i
200b6(mdo sde): mchod sbyin de byed tshe/ / slong ba rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas te// bsam pa thams cad sbyin pa byin byas pas// bsod nams bsags pa'i 'od zer grub par gyur// ye shes ldan pa'i 'od
200b7(mdo sde): zer rab gtong zhing / / sems can gang dag 'od des bskur byas pa// chos gcig sgo mo nas ni du ma yi// chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis khong du chud// chos kyi dbye ba sems can 'dzin btsud de/
201a1(mdo sde): don la nges pa'i ye shes rnams phye zhing // chos kyi tshig don brjod pa byas pas na// des na ye shes ldan des 'od zer grub// shes rab smon pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /
201a2(mdo sde): sems can gang dag 'od nges bskul byas pa// stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung zhing // rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug/ bdag po med chos stong pa byed med pa// sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla
201a3(mdo sde): mtshungs 'dra zhing / / rmi lam mtshungs la gzugs brnyan 'dra ba dag/ bstan pas shes rab sgron ma de grub bo// chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des bskul
201a4(mdo sde): byas pa/ / mi zad mdzod kyi gzungs ni thob gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin// chos 'dzin rnams la yongs su phan btags te// drang srong rnams la chos kyis bsrung byas
201a5(mdo sde): shing / / 'gro ba chos kyis rjes su gzungs byas pas// chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer grub par gyur// gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can 'jungs pa gang dag des bskul ba//
201a6(mdo sde): longs spyod mi rtag mi brtan shes gyur nas// de dag rtag tu gtong la dga' mos 'gyur// ma dul gdul dka'i sems can ser sna can// nor rnams rmi lam sprin dang 'drar shes nas// dga'
201a7(mdo sde): ba'i yid kyis sbyin pa spel byas pas/ / des na gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od grub bo// yongs su gdung med 'od zer rab gtong zhing // khrims 'chal sems can gang dag des bskul pa// tshul khrims
201b1(mdo sde): rnam par dag la gnas gyur nas/ / rang byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems skyed do// dge ba'i las lam yongs su dag pa dang // tshul khrims la yang sems can mang 'dzud cing // byang chub sems
201b2(mdo sde): kyang yang dag 'dzin 'jug pas/ / yongs gdung med pa'i 'od zer de grub bo// bzod pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // mi bzod sems can gang dag nges bskul ba// khro dang tha ba nga rgyal lo
201b3(mdo sde): spangs shing / / de dag rtag tu bzod mos dga' bar 'gyur// sdig ldan rnams kyi nyes byas bzod byas te// byang chub don tu 'khrug pa ma byas shing // bzod pa'i yon tan rtag tu bsngags brjod pa/
201b4(mdo sde): des na bzod pa bkod pa de grub bo// sbyangs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // le lo'i sem can gang dag des bskul pa// rigs par brtson pa dkon mchog gsum rnams la// sbyor ba skyo med
201b5(mdo sde): mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ / rigs par brtson pa dkon mchog gsum rnams la// sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod byas nas// de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las rab 'das te// byang chub bla med myur du reg
201b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ / sems can mang po brtson 'grus 'dzin bcug ste// dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas// zad pa'i dus na dam chos yongs gzung bas// des na sbyangs dang ldan pa'i
201b7(mdo sde): 'od thob bo/ / zhi bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // rnam 'khrugs sems can gang dag des bskul ba// de dag chags med sdang med rmongs med cing // rtog par gyur nas mnyam gzhag
202a1(mdo sde): sems su 'gyur/ / sdig pa'i grogs po skyon ldan spyod can dang // 'dre ba yongs su rnam par spang byas te// dgon pa rab zhi bsam gtan bsngags brjod pas// des na
202a2(mdo sde): zhi bar byed pa'i 'od grub bo/ / shes rab bkod pa 'od zer rab gtong zhing // shes 'chal sems can ji snyed des bskul ba// bden dang rten dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang // dbang po shes pa
202a3(mdo sde): rtogs par khong chud 'gyur/ / bden dang rten dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang // dbang po shes pa rtogs par khong chud cing // nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas// shes rab snang bar
202a4(mdo sde): mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ / rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs btang ste// byang chub don du chos gang btsal byas pa// chos de gus par byas nas rab bshad pas// shes rab bkod pa'i
202a5(mdo sde): 'od zer de grub bo/ / sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// sangs rgyas stong phrag du ma bsam yas rnams// pad+ma dam pa rnams la bzhugs
202a6(mdo sde): par mthong / / sangs rgyas che dang sangs rgyas rnam thar dang // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas brjod byas shing // sangs rgyas stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rab brjod pas// des na sangs rgyas ldan
202a7(mdo sde): pa'i 'od grub bo/ / mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // 'jigs nyen sems can gang dag des reg pa// 'byung po gza' dang gsang brdeg bcing ba dang // nad 'gro 'jigs pa
202b1(mdo sde): kun las thar bar 'gyur/ / mi 'jigs sbyin pas sems can gang bsgrubs dang // srog chags gsod las bzlog pa byas pa dang // 'jigs pa skyabs tshol rnams la bskyabs byas pas// mi
202b2(mdo sde): 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer nges grub bo/ / bde ba kun byed 'od gzer rab gtong zhing // nad pa na ba gang dag des reg pa// rnam pa kun tu nad kyi sdug bsngal bar// bsam gtan ting 'dzin
202b3(mdo sde): bde ba rnams kyang thob/ / nad gsos 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba dang // rin chen bcud len spos dang byug pa dang // bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar ngag dang // 'bru mar zas skom byin pas de thob
202b4(mdo sde): bo/ sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // tshe zad tha mar gang dag des bskul ba// sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// de dag shi 'phos sangs rgyas bzhugs
202b5(mdo sde): shing 'gro/ / 'chi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran byas te// dga' byed rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing // 'chi kar sangs rgyas skyabs su gtang brjod pas// sangs rgyas ston pa'i
202b6(mdo sde): 'od zer de thob bo/ / chos rab brjod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// chos nyan glog cing yi ger 'dri ba byed// de dag rtag tu chos la dga' mos
202b7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / chos kyi mu ge byung tshe chos brjod de// chos tshol rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing // 'dun pa bskyed de chos la brtson gyis shes// brjod pas chos rab brjod pa de thob bo//
203a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sras rnams yongs su bskul ba'i phyir// dbyangs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // 'jig rten gsum na sgra rgyu ji snyed pa// kun kyang de bzhin gshegs
203a2(mdo sde): pa'i gsung du thos/ / gsang bstod sgra yis drang srong che bstod de// rgyal ba'i gsung sgra don tu sil snyan dang // sgra chen dril bu sbyin rnams 'gro kun la// rab tu bsgrags pas dbyangs ldan 'od
203a3(mdo sde): grub bo/ / 'chi med sbyin pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang dag bod des bskul byas pas// bag med spyod pa thams cad rab spangs te// yon tan kun la brtson pa nyams su len//
203a4(mdo sde): 'dus byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste// sdug bsngal 'tshe ba du mas yongs su gang // 'gog pa rtag tu bde zhing zhi skyed ces// brjod pas 'chi med sbyin pa de thob bo// khyad par ldan pa'i 'od zer rab
203a5(mdo sde): gtong zhing / / sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// rgyal ba rnams kyi tshul khrims khyad par dang // ting 'dzin khyad par shes rab khyad par thos// thub chen rgyal po'i khrims kyi mchog gyur
203a6(mdo sde): cing / ting 'dzin mchog dang shes rab mchog gyur ces// byang chub don tu bstod cing bsngags brjod pas// des na khyad par ldan pa'i 'od grub bo// rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /
203a7(mdo sde): sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa// rin chen mi zad gter rnams thob gyur nas// drang srong che la rin chen dam pas mchod// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten rin chen phul// skye bo nyon mong
203b1(mdo sde): rin chen rnams kyis bsdus/ / rgyal ba rnams la rin chen rab phul bas// rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer grub par gyur// spros rab sdang ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sems can gang drag 'od nges
203b2(mdo sde): bskul byas pa/ / mi la med spos yid 'ong tshor gyur nas// sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur// mi dang lha yi spos dang byug pa yis// mi yi gtso la mchod pa rab byas te// spos la
203b3(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i gzugs dang mchod rten dag/ byas pas spos rab snang ba de grub bo// sna tshogs bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog sna tshogs dang // sil
203b4(mdo sde): snyan bsgrags shing spos kyis gdugs pa yis/ / pho brang dam pa mdzes byas me tog bkram// sil snyan ngag gis rgyal ba rnams bsdu zhing // me tog byugs pa bdug spos phye ma dang /
203b5(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog rnams kyis mchod// des na sna tshogs bkod pa grub par gyur// shin tu dang byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas par byed/
203b6(mdo sde): mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams spyad byas pas// des na shin tu dang byed 'od grub bo// sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // spos kyi char 'bebs sprin rnams kun tu gnas// mchod
203b7(mdo sde): rten 'khor sar spos kyi chus btab pos/ / sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od de rab tu thob// lhab lhub bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // gcer bu gos yod rgyan dang ldan par 'gyur// gos dang
204a1(mdo sde): kha go brgyan 'phreng sna tshogs dag/ sbyin pa byas pas lhab lhub bkod pa grub// ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // bkres pa kha zas ro mchog thob par 'gyur//
204a2(mdo sde): zas dang skom dang ro mchog sna tshogs rnams// byin pas ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od grub bo// nor rnams ston pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // dbul po dag gis rin chen gter rnams thob// dkon
204a3(mdo sde): mchog gsum la gter bzhi'i mi zad pa/ / dbul ba byas pas nor ston 'od thob bo// mi rnams spyod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // de tshe long ba sna tshogs gzugs rnams mthong // rgyal ba dag dang
204a4(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/ / mar me phul bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub// rna ba rnams skyong 'od zer rab gtong zhing // rna ba nyams pas sgra mang thos par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod
204a5(mdo sde): rten la/ / sil snyan phul bas rnga skyong 'od zer grub// sna rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sngon 'chang ma tshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/
204a6(mdo sde): spos rab phul bas snga skyong 'od zer grub/ lce rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sgra snyan yid 'ong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bstod// mi snyan brlang par smra ba rnam spangs te// 'jam par
204a7(mdo sde): sprasmras pas lce skyong 'od zer grub/ / lus rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // dbang po nyams pa dbang po ldan par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// lus gtung
204b1(mdo sde): byas pas lus rnams sbyong ba thob/ / sems rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // smyos pa thams cad sems dang ldan par 'gyur// ting 'dzin dbang rjes sems 'gro byas pas na//
204b2(mdo sde): sems rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer de grub bo// gzugs rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // mi dbang rnams kyi bsam yas sku thong ste// sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang /
204b3(mdo sde): mchod rten brgyan byas gzugs skyong 'od grub bo// sgra rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // sgra ni sgra min stong par rab tu shes// rkyen las byung bas brag cha 'dra'o zhes// sgra rnams bstun
204b4(mdo sde): pas 'od zer de grub bo/ / dri rnams sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog tu 'gyur// spos rab mchog chus rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag/ khrus byas byang chub zhing gi
204b5(mdo sde): 'od de yin/ / ro bro sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing // dug can dug med ro yi mchog tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la// ro mchog thams cad phul ba'i 'od de yin// reg
204b6(mdo sde): rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing / / reg na rtsub pa 'jam zhing bde bar 'gyur// mdung thung rtse gsum ral gri mda' chen char// 'phreng ba 'jam pa pad+ma ut+pal 'gyur// bcos bu'i ras mang
204b7(mdo sde): 'jam zhing reg bde rnams/ / rgyal ba rnams kyi gshegs shul bting bkram ste// me tog byug pa na bza' 'jam rnams dang // 'phreng ba bla re phul ba'i 'od de yin// chos rnams sbyong ba'i 'od
205a1(mdo sde): zer rab gtong zhing / / 'jig rten phan mdzad rgyal ba thams cad kyi// spu rnams kun nas chos rnams bsam mi khyab// byung ba thos nas mos pa thams cad tshim// rkyen
205a2(mdo sde): las byung bas ma skyes ngo bo nyid/ / rgyal ba rnams kyi sku ni chos sku ste// chos nyid mkha' bzhin rtag tu gnas so zhes// brjod pas chos rnams sbyong ba thob par 'gyur// 'od zer sgo mo de dag la
205a3(mdo sde): sogs pa/ / drang srong rnams kyi spu yi sgo gcig nas// 'od zer gang+gA'i bye ma snyed 'byung ste// kun kyang las sbyor tha dad tshul can no// ji ltar de dag spu yi sgo gcig nas// 'od zer gang+gA'i bye
205a4(mdo sde): ma snyed 'byung ba/ / ma lus spu rnams kun nas de bzhin te// drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o// yon tan gang gis 'od zer gang grub pa'i// yon tan de grogs sngon cad gang gyur pa//
205a5(mdo sde): dedag nyid las 'od zer rab 'byung ste// drang srong ye shes rnam 'phrul 'dod 'dra'o// de dag bsod nams sngon grogs gang yin la// rjes su yi rang gsol ba sus btab dang // gang gis
205a6(mdo sde): mthong ste dge ba bsags gyur pas/ / de dag kun gyis 'od zer de dag shes// gang dag bsod nams byas shing dge bsags dang // gang dag yang yang sangs rgyas rnams mchod cing //
205a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yon tan bdun te don gnyer ba// de dag kun la 'od zer de dag skul// dper na dmus long nyi ma mi mthong yang // de med ma yin 'jig rten kun tu 'char// mig dang ldan pas shar
205b1(mdo sde): bar shes gyur nas/ / kun kyang rang rang so so'i las la 'jug/ de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kun// rab tu 'byung yang log pas nyen gyur cing // mos nyams bal ba rnams kyis mi mthong/
205b2(mdo sde): ste/ blo gros yangs pa rnams la de dag mod// dper rgyan nor bu gzhon pa gzhal med khang // bcud kyis len dang rin chen byug pa spos// de dag skye bo che la yod mod kyi// phongs par gyur
205b3(mdo sde): pa rnams la de dag med/ / de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag mod// de dag yod kyang log par nyen gyur cing // mos pa nyams pa rnams kyis mi mthong ste// blo gros yangs pa rnams la de dag
205b4(mdo sde): mod/ gang dag 'od zer dbye ba 'di thos nas// dad cing mos la dang ba skyes gyur na// bdag ni yon tan che rgyur mi 'gyur zhes// de dag dogs dang som nyi mi bskyed do// de dag g.yog 'khor
205b5(mdo sde): bkod pa rnam 'phrul pa/ / ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub byed cing // byams bcugan tu tha snyed rnams kyis// 'an ring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston par byed// 'od bkod de dag pad+mas
205b6(mdo sde): tshogs pa/ / stong gsum tshad tsam byin gyis brlabs byas nas// skyil krung bcas pa'i lus kyis kun khyab ston// ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra'o// de dag zhing bcu'i rdul skyed
205b7(mdo sde): pad+ma gzhan/ / 'khor dang bcas pa byin gyis brlabs byas shing // sangs rgyas sras kyis thams cad yongs su bskor// de dag ting 'dzin ting 'dzin med par gnas// drang srong de yis sems
206a1(mdo sde): can gang dag rnams/ / yongs su smin byas sangs rgyas legs bsgrubs pa// de dag pad+ma chen po de bskor cing // kun kyang thal mo sbyar nas lta zhing 'khod// gang dag ting
206a2(mdo sde): 'dzin gnas par rab zhugs pa/ / skyes chen rnams kyis chos nyid 'di yin te// rang gi slob mas kun kyang yongs bskor nas// skar ma'i tshogs kyis zla ba bskor ba bzhin// de dag ji ltar phyogs
206a3(mdo sde): gcig rab 'jug cing / / zham ring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston byed pa// de bzhin phyogs rnams ma lus kun tu ston// ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra'o// de dag phyogs kyi dra ba khyab
206a4(mdo sde): gnas pa'i/ / ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub byed cing // kha cig mnyam gzhag kho cig ldang bar yang // phyogs rnams kun tu rang gi lus ston to// de dag shar gyi phyogs su mnyam gzhag cing /
206a5(mdo sde): nub kyi phyogs nas dpa' bo rnam par ldang // nub kyi phyogs su mnyam par gzhag gyur cing // bdag nyid chen po shar gyi phyogs nas ldang // de bzhin phyogs bcu rnams su rab tu 'jug/ gzhan
206a6(mdo sde): gyi phyogs su mnyam par gzhag gyur la/ / ye shes yon tan phyug po gzhan nas ldang // drang srong ting 'dzin rnams 'phrul 'di 'dra'o// shar phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa//
206a7(mdo sde): grangs med ma lus dag na rang byung ba// de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams// zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par snang // phyogs der mnyam par gzhag pa bstan byas nas// dpa' bo nub
206b1(mdo sde): kyi zhing rnams ma lus par/ / rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum rgyal kun la// mchod pa du ma rab tu byed par snang // nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa// grangs med ma lus dag na
206b2(mdo sde): bzhugs sangs rgyas/ / de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams// zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par snang // phyogs der mnyam par gzhag par bstan byas nas// dpa' bo shar gyi zhing rnams
206b3(mdo sde): ma lus par/ / rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum rgyal kun la// mchod pa du ma rab tu byed par snang // de bzhin phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su// phyogs rnams ma lus kun tu brtan pa 'jug/ kha
206b4(mdo sde): cig mnyam gzhag kha cig langs gyur cing / / 'jig rten sgron ma rnams la mchod byed snang // de dag mig gi lam la mnyam gzhag cing // gzugs kyi lam las bdag nyid chen po ldang // gzug
206b5(mdo sde): rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ston pa na/ / de la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur// gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par gzhag gyur la// mig ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa
206b6(mdo sde): med par rab ston cing / / mig gi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang // de dag rna ba'i lam la mnyam gzhag cing // sgra'i lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang // gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur
206b7(mdo sde): bsgra dang skad rnams kun la rab tu zhugs/ / sgra yi lam la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing // rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // rna ba'i lam nas dran
207a1(mdo sde): ldan rnam par ldang / / de dag sna yi lam la mnyam gzhag cing // dri yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang // gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmong 'gyur ba// dri mchog dam pa
207a2(mdo sde): 'jug par rab tu zhugs/ / dri yi lam la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing // sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // sna yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang // de dag
207a3(mdo sde): lce yi lam la mnyam gzhag cing / / ro mchog kun gyi lam nas rnam par ldang // gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba// bdag nyid chen po ro mchog rnams dang ldan// ro mchog rnams la
207a4(mdo sde): mnyam par gzhag gyur cing / / lce ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te// stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // lce yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang // de dag lus kyi lam la mnyam gzhag cing //
207a5(mdo sde): reg pa'i lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang // gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba// 'jig rten bde ba skyed pa'i reg la zhugs// reg pa'i lam la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing // lus
207a6(mdo sde): ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/ / stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // lus kyi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang // de dag sems kyi lam la mnyam gzhag cing // chos kyi lam nas bdag nyid
207a7(mdo sde): chen po ldang / / gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs 'gyur ba// chos la gnas pa'i 'jug pa rab tu zhugs// chos lam rnams la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing // sems ni mi skyes ma byung rang
207b1(mdo sde): bzhin te/ / stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing // sems kyi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang // de dag byis pa'i lus la mnyam gzhag cing // lang tsho shugs la gnas pa rnams las ldang /
207b2(mdo sde): lang tso shugs gnas rnams la mnyam gzhag cing // rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus las rnam par ldang // rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus la mnyam gzhag cing // dad pa'i dge bsnyen ma'i lus
207b3(mdo sde): las ldang / / dge bsnyen dang ma'i lus la mnyam gzhag cing // dad pa'i dge bsnyen lus las rnam par ldang // dad pa'i dge bsnyen lus la mnyam gzhag cing // dge slong ma'i lus las rnam par
207b4(mdo sde): ldang / / dge slong ma'i lus la mnyam gzhag cing // dge slong mang du thos pa'i lus las ldang // dge slong mang thos lus la mnyam gzhag cing // slob dang mi slob lus las rnam par ldang // slob dang
207b5(mdo sde): mi slob lus las mnyam gzhag cing / / rkyen gyi sangs rgyas lus las rnam par ldang // rkyen gyis sangs rgyas lus la mnyam gzhag cing // sangs rgyas sku mchog rab las rnam par ldang // sangs
207b6(mdo sde): rgyas sku mchog rab la mnyam gzhag cing / / lha yi lus gzugs las ni rnam par ldang // lha yi lus gzugs la ni mnyam gzhag cing // rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klu yi lus las ldang // rdzu 'phrul
207b7(mdo sde): che klu'i lus la mnyam gzhag cing / / 'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus las rnam par ldang // 'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus la mnyam gzhag cing // 'byung po kun gyi lus las rnam par ldang // 'byung po
208a1(mdo sde): kun gyi lus la mnyam gzhag cing / / smra yi sgo gcig nas ni rnam par ldang // spu sgo gcig la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing // spu sgro thams cad nas ni rnam par ldang //
208a2(mdo sde): spu sgo kun la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing // skra rtse gcig gi khyon las rnam par ldang // skra rtse gcig gi khyon la mnyam gzhag cing // skra rtse kun gyi khyon la rnam par ldang // skra rtse
208a3(mdo sde): kun gyi khyon la mnyam gzhag cing / / phra rab rdul gyi rdul las de dag ldang // rdul gcig la ni mnyam par gzhag gyur cing // ma lus rdul rnams kun las rnam par ldang // rdul rnam
208a4(mdo sde): ma lus kun la mnyam gzhag cing / / rgya mtsho'i rdo rje'i gzhi las rnam par ldang // rgya mtsho'i rdo rje'i gzhi la mnyam gzhag cing // nor bu'i shing tog dag las rnam par ldang // shing
208a5(mdo sde): tog rnams la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing / / rgyal ba rnams kyi 'od zer sgo nas ldang // rgyal ba'i 'od zer sgo la mnyam gzhag cing // rgya mtsho'i chu'i chu klung rnams las ldang /
208a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i chu klung rnams la mnyam gzhag cing // bdag nyid chen po me'i lam las ldang // me'i lam la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing // rlung gi lam las dran ldan rnam par ldang //
208a7(mdo sde): rlung gi lam la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing // bdag nyid chen po sa yi gzhi las ldang // sa yi gzhi la mnyam par gzhag gyur cing // lha kun gzhal med khang las rnam par ldang //
208b1(mdo sde): lha kun gzhal med khang la mnyam gzhag cing // dran ldan de dag mkha' las rnam par ldang // yon tan bsam yas bsags pa de dag gi/ ting 'dzin rnam thar de dag bsam mi khyag
208b2(mdo sde): rgyal ba kun gyis bskal pa bsam yas su/ / bshad pa mdzad kyang zad par mdzad mi sbyong // 'gro las rnam smin bsam gyis mi khyab ste// rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gsungs pa ni// klu yi rnam
208b3(mdo sde): 'phrul sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul dang / / bsam byed bsam gtan rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab// de dag la yang dpe stan brjod par bya// de dag 'dra ba'i dpe lta cang med de// mkhas shing rig pa'i
208b4(mdo sde): skye bo dpe rnams kyi/ / bstan na myur du don rnams shes par 'gyur// rnam thar brgyad kyi dbang la gnas pa yi// nyan thos gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur// mang por gyur nas phyir yang
208b5(mdo sde): gcig gyur te/ / mkha' la bsam gtan 'cha' zhing 'bar bar byed// smad nas me 'bar stong nas chu yi rgyun// stod nas me 'bar smad nas chu yi rgyun// 'gro dang 'greng dang nyal dang 'dug
208b6(mdo sde): pa dang / / lus 'phrul skad cig gcig la bsam mi khyab// de ni snying rje che dang mi ldan zhing // byang chub mi tshil 'jig rten yang 'dor yang // lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na//
208b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten phan 'dod ci phyir ston mi byed// nyi zla mkha' las rnam par rgyu 'dod cing // phyogs rnams kun gyi chu yi dang ngag dang // mtsho mtshe'u tshe bran snod dang rin chen dang // rgya mtsho chu klung rnams
209a1(mdo sde): su gzugs bstan ston/ / de bzhin gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// skyes bu dpa' bo phyogs bcu kun tu ston// ting 'dzin rnam thar kun gyi tshul la mkhas/
209a2(mdo sde): de la de bzhin gshegs pa rang byung dbang // ngang pa'i mtsho la yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag/ de dag so so rang gi gzugs bstan mthong // ral gri mda' chen gzhu dang mda' rnams dang // go
209a3(mdo sde): gyon gzhon dang theg par bcas su mthong / / gang gi gzugs gang gnas gang cha byad gang // de dang de dag de ltar chu las mthong // 'on kyang chu la byams sdang rnam rtog med// drang srong ting
209a4(mdo sde): 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/ / rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra ldan zhes bya ba// sems can rgya mtshor ji snyed skyes rnams kyi// sgra yi yan lag dbyangs kyi tshul mkhas te// rang gi skad kyis skad kun tshim
209a5(mdo sde): par byed/ / sgra ldan chags sdang gti mug can de yang // skad rnams kun gyi sgra yi tshul mkhas na// gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang thob rnams// lhar bcas 'jig rten ci phyir mgu
209a6(mdo sde): mi byed/ / tum bu ru yi chung ma dbyangs ldan ma// tshangs pa'i bu mo yid las byung ba de// bden dang dam bcas mi 'tshe dga' rnams kyi// sems dang yid dang kha yi sgor 'jug ste// dpyang
209a7(mdo sde): ldan chags bcas zhe sdang can de yang / / brtul zhugs grub mthun dbyangs kyi yan lag gis// yid 'ong skad kyis 'jig rten mgu byed na// ye shes yon tan phyug rnams cis mi byed//
209b1(mdo sde): rig sngags tshul mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po na// sna tshogs gzugs mang mtha' yas ston pa byed// nyin mtshan yud dang zla ba lo brgya dang // khyim bzang rgyas pa shin tu mdzes pa ston// 'dod
209b2(mdo sde): chags sdang ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang / / sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyis 'jig rten mgu byed na// bsam gtan mngon shes rnam thar rab brlabs pa// spyod tshul mkhas rnams ci phyir mgu mi byed// lha dang /
209b3(mdo sde): lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe// dga' ldan lha yis lha min pham byas na// de dag 'jigs pas gdugs bcas gzhon bcas shing // theg bcas dmag bcas go gyon bzhin du 'byer// 'dod
209b4(mdo sde): chags sdang ldan lha dbang de dag kyang / / lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na// dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dbang gnas dpa' bo rnams// lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed// rdo
209b5(mdo sde): rje 'chang ba'i glang po sa srung bu/ / dbang po'i 'khor gyur rdzu 'phrul chen po de// mgo bo sum cu rtsa sum mngon sprul cing // mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug drug ste// mche ba de dag
209b6(mdo sde): so so re re la'ang / / rdzing bu chus gang bdun bdun sprul pa byed// rdzi 'u de la'ang pad+ma sna tshogs pa// rnam par bkod pa bdun bdun sprul pa byed// pad+ma de la'ang lha yi bu mo dag/ sgyu
209b7(mdo sde): rtsal kun shes bdun bdun sprul pa byed/ / de dag rtsed mo glu gar tshul la mkhas// sum cu rtsa sum dbang po de dang rtse// glang po de yang lus ni bsgyur byas te// lha rnams kun dang
210a1(mdo sde): 'grogs shing 'dri bar byed/ / spyod pa'i tshul dang longs spyod kun yang mthun// glang po mchog gi rnam 'phrul de lta snang // glang po chags sdang gti mug ldan de
210a2(mdo sde): yang / 'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu ston byed na// shes rab thabs kyi stongs la sbyangs pa rnams// ting 'dzin brgya yis rnam 'phrul cis mi byed// sgra gcan ji ltar 'dod bzhin lus
210a3(mdo sde): 'phrul te/ / rdo rje'i gzhi la rkang pa 'jog byed cing // rgya mtsho lte bar phyin pa tsam du ston// ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyom// sgra gcan chags sdang gti mug ldan de yang // 'di 'dra'i rdzu
210a4(mdo sde): 'phrul rab tu ston byed na/ / 'jig rten sgron ma bdud rnams rab 'jom pa// rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas ci rab ston mi byed// brgya byin rnam 'phrul bsam yas rab snang ste// lha dang lha min dbang
210a5(mdo sde): po g.yul 'gyeng tshe/ / lha min bye ba 'phyes pa ji snyed pa// de snyed brgya byin rang gis lus las sprul// lha min dbang dang lha min phal kun gyis// brgya byin rang gi mdun na 'dug par shes// de
210a6(mdo sde): nirdo rje 'chang bas bzung ngo zhes/ / lha min dbang po kun yang mgo myos gyur// 'jigs par byed pa'i mig stong rab bstan te// rdo rje me lce 'bar ba thogs byed cing // lus la go bgos gzi brjid
210a7(mdo sde): bstan dka' ba'i/ / brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang po 'byer// de yang bsod nams phal pa'i mthu stobs kyis// lha rgyal don tu rnam par 'phrul byed na// 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi skyabs gyur
210b1(mdo sde): pa/ bsod nams mi zad rnams lha cis mi 'phrul// lha la skul ma bdebs pa lha yi rnga// lha las rnam par smin pas grub gyur pa// lha rnams bag med gnas par shes gyur nas// rnga de
210b2(mdo sde): nam mkha' las ni sgra sgrog ste/ / 'dod pa thams cad mi rtag ther zug min// tha shal mi brtan dbu ba'i ngo bo nyid// sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla mtshungs shing 'dra// srid pa thams cad rmi lam sprin
