399a2(mdo sde): zhing mdzes te/ gser gyi ri dang 'dra ba zhig bzhugs so zhes gsol to// rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs su phyag
399a3(mdo sde): 'tshal nas skyabs su gsol to/ / gal te kun tu rgyu 'dis smras pa bden te/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du gshegs pa lta srid dam/ bdag cag gi gtsug lag bshad
399a4(mdo sde): pa las kyang bskal pa dgu 'das nas gdod sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba zhig 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhe na/ ci da ltar sangs rgyas 'jig rten na ji srid bzhugs sam/ ci ste bzhugs na ci'i slad du yul
399a5(mdo sde): 'di'i phyogs su thugs brtse ba'i gnas su ma gyur snyam mo/ / de'i tshe steng gi nam mkha' las 'di skad du rigs kyi bu the tsom ma byed cig/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa shin tu brdzun pa'i brtson 'grus kyis
399a6(mdo sde): bskal pa dgu las 'das so zhes smra ba'i sgra grags so/ / smra ba'i tshig thos nas bu mo sa la brdugs te/ bdug spos bsregs shing thal mo sbyar nas bsngags shing bstod te/ 'di skad du bcom ldan
399a7(mdo sde): 'das mngon par mkhyen pa dang ldan pa bdag gis sems pa 'di mkhyen na/ byams pa dang thugs rjes yul 'dir gshegs par smon to// de'i tshe spos kyi dud pas sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gzhal
399b1(mdo sde): med khang du phyin te/ bai DUR+Ya dkar po'i sprin du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lan bdun bskor te/ gser gyi gdugs su gyur to// gdugs kyi dril bu las 'di skad kyi sgra snyan pas/ sangs rgyas
399b2(mdo sde): spyan 'dren pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun yang gshegs par gsol ba'i sgra skad byung bar gyur to// de tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis gzigs nas/ dge slong gi dge
399b3(mdo sde): 'dun rnams las mngon par she ba drug po thob pa dag zhabs 'bring du chos shig/ na ga ha la'i rgyal po phur pa phud de 'bod pa'i yul der 'dong zhes bka' stsal nas/ 'od bsrungs chen po 'khor lnga/
399b4(mdo sde): brgya dang bcas te/ bai DUR+Ya'i ri sprul nas/ ri de la 'bab chu dang chu mig dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing dang / shing gi 'og na gser gyi khri brdugs pa la dngul gyi 'od 'bar te/
399b5(mdo sde): 'od las phug tu gyur pa'i nang na/ 'od srung chen po de na rtag tu mi nyal bar 'dug go/ slob ma rnams kyang sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la gnas so// ri de sprin mgyogs pa 'am/ rlung drag po ltar drang
399b6(mdo sde): srong snying gi ri la phyin par gyur te/ mo'u 'gal yan chen po yang 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas ste/ klu 'khril pa brgya stong sprul nas/ de la 'dug cing klu'i kha nas me byung ste/ gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
399b7(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun gyi khri dang / rin po che'i bla re dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan tshad med par sprul pa'i nang na mo'u 'gal ya na bai DUR+Ya'i mi lta bur phyi nang gsal bar 'dug pa dag drang srong
400a1(mdo sde): snying gi ri la lhag so/ / shA ri'i bu yang mngon par shes pa'i mabus gangs kyi ri lta bu'i shel gyi ri sbrel te/ shel gyi phrag gi nang na dge tshul gyun te la sogs pa lnga dge tshul lnga
400a2(mdo sde): brgya dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lug tu bcas te/ gangs lta bu'i shel gyi ris bskor nas/ shA ri'i bu shel gyi dkar po'i phug gi nang nas gser gyi mi lta bur sprul te/ gser gyi kha dog gi 'od btang nas/
400a3(mdo sde): 'od rnam pa sna tshogs kyis thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ chos kyi sgra chen po yongs su sgrog cing dge tshul rnams nyan bzhin du yul der lpags so// ka t+yA ya na chen po yang 'khor dge slong lnga brgya dang /
400a4(mdo sde): pad+mo gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa lta bu mang po dag sprul te/ dge slong rnams de la 'dug nas lus kyi snad nas ni 'od zer chu lta bu byung te/ chu mig lta bu'i 'od zer pad+mo'i bar kun na 'bab kyang sa la mi zag
400a5(mdo sde): go/ steng nas kyang yang gser gyi blar zes te/ dge slong rnams de'i nang na 'dug ste/ yul der lhags so// de ltar dgra bcom pa chen po brgya phrag phye dang bcu gsum rnams kyang so so nas 'khor dge slong
400a6(mdo sde): lnga brgya dang bcas te/ mngon par shes pa yang shA rI bu dang mo'u 'gal ya na dang 'dra bar byas nas steng gi nam mkha' las 'phags nas/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ldings pa bzhin du yul der lhags so//
400a7(mdo sde): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das chos gos bsnabs lhung bzed bsnams nas// chos gos bting ba yang dga' bo'i lag tu bskur te/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' la gom pas gshegs so// bcom ldan
400b1(mdo sde): 'das gom pas gshegs pa na rgyal chen ris bzhi'i rgyal po dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / gzhan yang lha'i bu grangs med pa dang / lha'i bu mo brgya stong snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan
400b2(mdo sde): bdun bskor te phyag 'tshal nas zhabs 'bring du chas so/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mgur nas gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer btang nas/ 'od zer de las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas khri
400b3(mdo sde): phrag brgya stong sprul to/ / sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang so so nas de bzhin du mgur gyi 'od zer btang ste/ de bzhin du sprul pa'i sangs rgyas khri phrag brgya stong sprul te/ sprul pa'i sangs rgyas
400b4(mdo sde): kyis 'dab chags su nam mkha'i khams yongs su bkang ste/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ldings pa bzhin du yul der gshegs so// yul der gshegs nas/ rgyal pos sangs rgyas bsus te
400b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de'i klu'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te gshegs pa mthong nas/ klu chen po bcu drug gis nam mkha' la sprin chen po bskyed nas 'brug sgra chen
400b6(mdo sde): po bsgrags te/ ser ba phababo// mi gnas kyang klog dang me 'byin cing / kha nas kyang me byung ste/ skur mo dang / lus kyib spu'i khung bu kun nas dud pa 'phrul zhi me rab tu 'bar ro// srin mo lnga yang mi
400b7(mdo sde): sdug pa'i gzugs bstan mig glog dang 'dra bar 'bar bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'greng ngo / / de'i tshe klu'i bu zhig gis bltas nas/ steng gi nam mkha' la sprul pa'i sangs rgyas yongs
401a1(mdo sde): su gang bar mthong ngo / / pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar me dang gdug pas/ sangs rgyas gcig la gnod par bya bar chas na/ da ltar bar snang la sangs rgyas grangs
401a2(mdo sde): med pa zhig bzhugs na zhes smras so/ / de nas klu gdug pa can gdug pa'i sems lhag par yang skyes te bu la skyo ba byas nas/ da ltar sangs rgyas gcig las med na mang po ga
401a3(mdo sde): yod ces smras so/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rjes rdo rje thogs pa grangs med pa'i lus sprul nas/ rdo rje mgo la me mgal bskor ba bzhin du me 'bar te/ me'i 'khor lo 'dab chags
401a4(mdo sde): su steng gi nam mkha' las babs nas me rab tu 'bar ba lcags khu dang 'dra bas klu ma rung ba'i lus bsregs so/ / klu'i rgyal po de 'jigs shing skrag te/ 'bros khung med nas sangs rgyas kyi grib
401a5(mdo sde): ma'i nang du zhugs so/ / sangs rgyas kyi grib ma rab tu bsil bas zil dngar gyi chus phog pa bzhin du/ klu'i tsha bzhi par gyur nas nam mkha' la ltos na steng gi bar snang la sangs rgyas kyis yongs
401a6(mdo sde): su gang bar mthong ngo / / sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang so so nas 'od zer grangs med pa stong ste/ 'od gcig gi nang na yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa dag bzhugs so// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas
401a7(mdo sde): de dag kyang so so nas/ 'od grangs med pa brgya stong snyed gtong ngo // 'od dag gi nang na yang lag na rdo rjes rdo rje gsor bas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // klu rnams kyis sangs rgyas mthong nas rab tu dga'
401b1(mdo sde): ba'i sems skyes so/ / lag na rdo rje mthong nas rab tu 'jigs shing skrag ste/ bal mo sbyar nas bsti stang du bcas te/ sangs rgyas la phrag 'tshal to// srin mong yang de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal
401b2(mdo sde): to/ / de'i tshe lha'i bu rnams kyis me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po dang / man 'dzu sha ka dang / man 'dzu sha ka chen po char bzhin du phab ste/ mchod pa byas nas lha'i rnga yang rang rdung zhing / lha rnams thal mo sbyar
401b3(mdo sde): nas steng gi nam mkha' la sdod do/ / de'i tshe rgyal po de 'khor lnga stong dang bcas te/ bdug spos sna tshogs bsregs nas spyi bos sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gdan la bzhugs par gsol to// de'i
401b4(mdo sde): tshe klu'i rgyal pos kyang rgya mtsho'i nang nas rin po che sna bdun gyi khri byung ste/ sangs rgyas la lag gis dar te/ phul nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mgon dang skyabs mdzad cing
401b5(mdo sde): lag na rdo rje 'di dag gi lus la mi gtse bar mdzad par ci gnang zhes gsol to/ / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi sems bu la smras pa bzhin du klu'i rgyal po la slob bskyed do// klu'i rgyal
401b6(mdo sde): po dang srin mo yang chos kyi rgyal por btul to/ / de'i tshe rgyal pos khri mthon po btsugs te/ gdan rab tu 'jam po bting nas ras dkar po'i yol bas bskor cing / mu tig gi dra bas bla rer bres nas/ bcom ldan
401b7(mdo sde): 'das gdan de la bzhugs par gsol to/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zhabs bte gnas gshegs pa na/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po'ibyin pa lta bu'i zhabs kyi byin pa las/ 'od kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa byung ste/
402a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la lan bdun bskor nas/ lha'i me tog dam pa'i bla rer gyur te/ me tog gi 'dab ma'i bar na sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa snyed thal mo sbyar te/
402a2(mdo sde): dbyangs du mas tshigs su bcad nas stod do// steng gi nam mkha' la sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i rnams kyi zhabs kyi byin pa las 'od bkye ba yang snga ma bzhin no// klu phra mo bcu drug lag na ri dang
402a3(mdo sde): pa bong dang / gnam lcags thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lhags nas/ 'khor mang pos 'jigs sgrags ste/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi nang du zhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gser bcom
402a4(mdo sde): lta bu'i phyag brkyang nas/ phyag sor 'brel ba'i za ba'i bar na rin po che chen po'i pad+mo char bzhin du phab ste/ 'khor mang po rnams kyis ni sprul pa'i sangs rgyas su mthong ngo // klu rnams kyis ni nam mkha' lding
402a5(mdo sde): gi rgyal pos 'chag cing za ba lta bur mthong ste/ klu rnams nam mkha' lding gis 'jigs skrag nas sangs rgyas kyi grib ma'i pheg te zhugs te/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas srog gi skyabs mdzad du gsol
402a6(mdo sde): zhes smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das yol ba dang / nye bar gshegs nas dga' bo la gding ba zing shig ces bka' stsal to// dga' bos yol ba'i nang du song ste/ lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas phrag pa g.yon
402a7(mdo sde): nas gting ba blangs pa'i tshe/ gding ba las gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che sna bdun gyis spros pa/ khri phrag lnga brgyar gyur to// gting ba'i tshi gser gyi blo rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i wa
402b1(mdo sde): phrag lnga brgyar gyur to/ / gru bzhi sa la brkyang ba'i tshe grwa gcig la yang rin po chu sna bdun gyi pad+mo khri phrag lnga brgyar gyur ta/ pad+mas dadab chags su yol ba'i nang gang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
402b2(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun gyi khri la skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs so/ / pad+mo rnams kyi steng na yang sangs rgyas dag bzhugs par gyur to// dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par mthong nas/ sangs
402b3(mdo sde): rgyas la phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor nas/ so so nas gding ba bting nas 'dug go// dge slong rnams gding ba ni bting ba thams dad bai rdzaR+Ya'i stan tu gyur to// dge slong rnams bai DUR+Ya'i stan la 'dug
402b4(mdo sde): nas/ bai DUR+Ya'i stan las 'od byung ste/ bai DUR+Ya'i breg phug tu gyur to// dge slong rnams me'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas/ dge slong dag gi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur to//
402b5(mdo sde): de'i tshe rgyal pos des sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / cho 'phrul de lta bu dag mthong nas/ ngo mtshar rmad kyi dga' ba skyes te thal mo sbyar nas/ de bzhin gsheg pa la lan bdun
402b6(mdo sde): bskor ba byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul mang po mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// gzhan yang 'khor mang po rnams
402b7(mdo sde): kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed du badrug go de'i tshe klu'i rgyal/ mdo 'di sngon rgyalas 'gyur ba'i 'jug ma rdzog pa sgyur 'phro lus par snang sde mkhas pas leg par ga kri 'tshal/
403a1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ AR+Ya par mAR+tha d+harma bi dza ya nA ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
403a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring por ma lon par g.ya'i ri la
403a3(mdo sde): dge slong mngon par zhugs pa mngon par zhugs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs ste/ lha bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma
403a4(mdo sde): dang / dge bsnyen ma brgyad khri drug stong dang / gyad drug khri dang / gcer bu pa bye ba phrag bcu gnyis dang / drang srong chen po mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ gdung ba lngas yan lag mchog pa lnga brgya/ yan
403a5(mdo sde): lag dkar ba/ sha med cing rus mgo pags kyis yog pa/ lto zhar zhing skra'i khur kher ba lus dgu pa/ g.yang gzhi dang shing shum gyon pa/ lag na ril ba thogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang yang thabs cig
403a6(mdo sde): go/ rgal bar 'dun pa rnams dang yang zabs cig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das ri nag po rnams kyi nang na/ ri'i rgyal po ri reb ltar drang srong rnams kyi nang na/ lha ma me/ lhan ne/ lgang nge/
403a7(mdo sde): lug rnams kyi nang na/ glang po che'i rgyal po mche bajug pa 'jal/ srin bu me khyer gyi drung na/ nyi zla dang mtshungs shing / rtswa ka sha'i me tog gi nang na man+da ra ba'i yal gdang 'jal/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal
403b1(mdo sde): po bya rog gis bskor ba dang 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das drang srong rnams kyi nang na nyis 'gyur du mdzes so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che gtong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la skams par nus
403b2(mdo sde): rdza 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dpag tu med par mdzad cing / glo g.yas g.yon gnyis nas 'od zer phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dpag tu med pa phyung / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba dpag tu mer
403b3(mdo sde): pa dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dpag tu med pa byung / dgra bcom pa brgya stong dpag tu med pa phyung / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma bcu
403b4(mdo sde): stong dpag tu med pa phyung / 'khor los sgyur ba dang / stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba dang / khams kyi rgyal po dang / rig sngags 'chang dpag tu med pa phyung / rgya dang ri brags pa dang / 'gro lding ba dang /
403b5(mdo sde): lho pa phyogs dang / nags khrod pa dpag tu med pa phyung / rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu dang / mi gzugs dang / mdog dang / smra ba'i
403b6(mdo sde): skad sna tshogs pa ji snyed pa dang / lha'i ris ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las byung ngo // de nas 'khor chen po da the tsom du gyur nas/ phan tshun gdong du
403b7(mdo sde): lta'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga' ste/ rin po che'i char 'bebs pa nas/ rgyan thams cad kyi bar gyi char 'bebs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin
404a1(mdo sde): las bzhengs te/ seng ge bsgyings pas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcur gzigs ma thag tu de nas phyogs
404a2(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang ba de dag thams cad lag mthil du bzhag pa bzhin du/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su
404a3(mdo sde): kun tu snang ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ji ltar byung ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sprul pa byung ba rje
404a4(mdo sde): skyed pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'dus par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag kyang dge
404a5(mdo sde): slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i bye ma snyed dag dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po dpe med pa thogos te 'dir lhags so// de bzhin du lha dang
404a6(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa du ma dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul de mthong
404a7(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas gang dag phyogs bcu nas lpags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mchod pa bla na med pas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen
404b1(mdo sde): bkur byas te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis yongs su bsgrubs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do// mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du yang ci rigs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do// gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi
404b2(mdo sde): pa phyung ba de dag kyang mnar med pa yan chad 'og min gyi gnas man chad du mngon par phyung ste slar log go/ / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sprul pa phyung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni/
404b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spu'i khung thams cad du nub bo// gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa phyung ba de dag ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rnams su nub bo// de
404b4(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i phung po zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
404b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// kye ma mo rnams kyi ni 'dren pa yis// sngon chad ma byung mdzad
404b6(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs 'di/ / kye dgu kun la myur du kun bstan pa dang // de yis bdud du thams cad mog mog bgyis// phan tshun dag tu tshig tu smra bgyid pa// kye ma'o shin tu ngo mtshar che zhes mchi// bdag cag ci zhig
404b7(mdo sde): phyir 'dir lhags so/ / bdag cag bcom mo bdag cag bcom mo zhes mchi// dka' thub can bdag dka' thub can min gyur// nyam chung lus la pags pa tsam zhig las// bdag 'khogs
405a1(mdo sde): bdag skams bde ba rnams las nyams/ / bdag cag rdzu 'phrul thob par gyur ma yin// yi ge ma mchis rdzu 'phrul sum rnams kyis// bstan pa'i dgra rnams mogo mog gyur
405a2(mdo sde): pa mdzad/ / bstan pa'i 'dren pa khyod kyis de ring ni// sangs rgyas sras la dus ston chen po mdzad// 'khor 'di thams cad the tsom 'tshal bar gyur// dga' ba skyes shing sems kyang rab dga' ste/
405a3(mdo sde): gang zhig gnas nas lha tshogs bdag cag kyang // 'jig rten mgon po'i sangs rgyas gyur cig mchis// 'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur bgyis// sangs rgyas sras po mtha'
405a4(mdo sde): yas rnams kyis bskor/ / 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'khor gyi nang na mchis// cho 'phrul rnam pa phye ste bstan du gsol// 'di dag chos ni gang gi ltas shig lags// thub pa chos ni gang zhig
405a5(mdo sde): gsung bar bzhed/ / 'khor 'di thams cad 'gyod cing mchis lags nas/ sems can thugs brtse slad du bdag la gsungs// de nas sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis//
405a6(mdo sde): 'khor da ni nang nas/ drang srong chen po me sgron zhes bya ba gcig gis/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i phung po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye gzhon nu re shig kha rog shig/ kho bo'i dri ba dri bar bya'o//
405a7(mdo sde): gal te kho bo'i dri ba khong du chub par byed na ni/ de thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i ming dang yang 'thun no// don te sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen pos phyung ba'i 'gro lding ba rnams kyis sprul pa byed
405b1(mdo sde): du zad na ni/ 'dir ngo mtshar yang ci che ste/ skyes bu ngan pa dang / sgyu ma mkhan rnams kyis ni 'di grub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis/ zang srong ga
405b2(mdo sde): tshegs la kun tu gzigs nas/ rbang srong chen po me sgron la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshe dang ldan pa drang srong chen po ci nus kyis dri ba jis shig dang / rnam par byang bar bya'o// de nas
405b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / kye go'u ta ma sems can gyi skye ba gang nas byung / ci'i slad du bskal pas sregs par 'gyur/ sems can rnams
405b4(mdo sde): gnas gang du 'du bar 'gyur/ nang nas sems can phra ba khru gang tsam 'am/ mtho gang tsam mam/ mdzug mo tsam mam/ mthe bong tsam mam/ nas dang / gro dang / mon sran sde'u dang / mon sran
405b5(mdo sde): gre'u dang / til dang / yungs 'bru tsam 'am/ sem can ji tsam zhig nang na mchis bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po me sgron la/ drang srong chen
405b6(mdo sde): po legs so legs so zhes/ legs so zhes bya ba byin no// drang srong chen po che bskal pa drug bcu pa'i bri ba 'bri 'di ni 'thun pa'o// de nas drang srong chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ drang srong
405b7(mdo sde): chen po me sgron gyi tshe'i tshad ni ma brjod par bdag cag lhan cig gnas gnas gnas pa rnams kyis kyang ma shes na 'dis ji ltar shes snyam mo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sngal pa/ zang song
406a1(mdo sde): chen po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ / drang srong chen po gang nga la sems can gyi skye ba gang nas byung zhes smras pa de ni/ yi ges brjod pa ma
406a2(mdo sde): yin pa'o/ / sems can zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa'i rkyen las skye ba dang / rga sha'i bar du byung ba'o// drang srong chen po yang rgyu rkyen las sems can skye ste/ rgyu rkyen ni pha ma'o// drang srong chen po yang pha
406a3(mdo sde): ma 'grogs pa ni de'i rgyu'o/ / gang gi tshe yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslad pa'i las kyi rlung rnams kyis bud med kyi 'grong du 'jug pa de ni de'i rkyen to// drang srong chen po yang sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i
406a4(mdo sde): bden pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ni sems can no// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dang / khams
406a5(mdo sde): bco brgyad ni sems can no/ / zang srong chen po sems can yang gzhan la las kyang gzhan ma yin/ las kyang gzhan la sems can yang gzhan ma yin no// drang srong chen po sems can ni 'grib
406a6(mdo sde): pa ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// zang srong chen pos gsol pa/ kye go'u ta ma gal te sems can la 'grib pa ma mchis/ 'phel ba ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du sems can khyi'i skye gnas nas shi
406a7(mdo sde): 'phos te dbang sgyur du 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin du ma yin no// gal te dbang sgyur dbang sgyur yin du zin na ni/ dbang med par 'chi ba'i
406b1(mdo sde): mi rigs so/ / drang srong chen po gang rang gi lus kyi gtso bo ma yin pa ji ltar dbang sgyur du 'gyur/ drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na srin po me khyer 'di snyam du bdag gis 'dzam bu'i gling snang bar bya'o snyam du
406b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rkyen gyis srin bu me khyer gyis 'dzam bu'i gling snang bar byed dam/ sems ma dul ba ni dbang sgyur yang dag pa ma yin no// drang srong chen po yang gal te dbang sgyur nyon mongs pa 'bri bar gyur na/
406b3(mdo sde): ni/ khyi la nyon mongs pa shas che bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe dbang sgyur dang nyon mongs pa dag khyil yang yod cing / dbang sgyur la yang yod pa de'i tshe/ sems can la 'grib pa yang mi dmigs 'phel ba yang mi
406b4(mdo sde): dmigs so/ / drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ go'u ta mas nyon mongs pa 'grib par mdzad dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po ngas phyin cig log dag bzlog pa gang yang
406b5(mdo sde): med/ 'grib par byas pa yang med do// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ gal te de ltar na khyod kyang dbang sgyur ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po de de bzhin te/
406b6(mdo sde): ma byung ba'i phyir nga yang dbang sgyur ma yin no// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ go'u ta ma bka' mchid 'di re shig zhog/ go'u ta ma'i sras kyis pha ma 'grogs pa las sems can skye'o zhes gsungs nas/
406b7(mdo sde): sems can mang du 'grogs pa las sems can skye ba nyung bar gyur pa 'di ji lta bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ sa bon gcig las
407a1(mdo sde): shing skye bar 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gcig las kyang 'bras bu mtha' yas par 'gyur ro// de las res 'ga' ni gcig sa bon gyi 'os su 'gyur gyi lhag ma sa bon gyis 'os su mi 'gyur
407a2(mdo sde): ba de ji lta bu/ drang srong chen pos gsol ba/ kye go'u ta ma rlung dang nyis mas shing tog rnams ma rungs par gyis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen pod de bzhin te/ las kyi
407a3(mdo sde): rlung gis kyang sems can gyi 'bras bu rnams ma rungs par byas so/ / drang srong chen po kha cig ni mngal na gnas pa nyid kyi tshe/ srin bu rnams kyi zos so// kha cig ni las kyi rlung rnams kyis phye mar
407a4(mdo sde): byas so/ / drang srong chen po shing gnyis pa ni nyung ngo // sems can gyi nyes pa ni ma // drang srong chen po yang sems can gyi khams ni yongs su rtog pas kun nas spang ba ste/ zang srong chen po sems
407a5(mdo sde): can rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa ji snyed pa de snyed du srid pa la dmig te/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir sems can gyi khams ni yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'o zhes nga smra'o// drang
407a6(mdo sde): srong chen pos gsol pa/ kye goru ta ma de de bzhin te/ zhu ba brjod pa 'di ni rnam par dag go/ ci'i slad du de bskal pas bsreg par 'gyur ba bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
407a7(mdo sde): drang srong chen po chos kyi dbyings 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir bskal pas bsregs par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po gal te bskal pas bsregs par mi 'gyur na/ chos kyi dbyings gnyis su 'gyur te/ la la mi
407b1(mdo sde): rtag la/ la la rtag par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bden par smra bar mi 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po gang gi phyir 'di thams cad rtag pa ma yin/ brtan pa ma yin/ dbugs
407b2(mdo sde): phyin pa ma yin pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba de'i ming thob bo// drang srong chen pos bram ze'i khye'u la smras pa/ 'di thams cad mkhyen par mtshan gsol pa/
407b3(mdo sde): ni 'thun no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po gal te bskal pas bsregs par ma gyur na/ 'di ni dus bzang po'i/ 'di ni dus ngan pa'o zhes
407b4(mdo sde): bya bar dus tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro/ / zang srong chen po gal te yang bskal pas bsregs par ma gyur na/ legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las
407b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi rnam par smin pa tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro/ / drang srong chen po yang 'di lta ste/ bskal pas bsregs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs la rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ste//
407b6(mdo sde): drang srong chen po sems can ji snyed bskal pas bsregs par 'gyur ba thos nas dad par 'gyur ba'i sems can de snyed de bzhin gshegs pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos sdud par 'gyur ro// drang srong
407b7(mdo sde): chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'chu ba ldag pa'i sbrul ni mog gis kyang rngub/ rna ba dang sna dang / kha'i sgo nas kyang rngub bo// drang srong chen po de bzhin gshegs pa la yang de ltar lta ste/
408a1(mdo sde): sbyin pas kyang sdud snyan par smra bar kyang sdud/ don spyod pas kyang sdud/ don 'thun pas kyang sdud do// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ gser la gnod par bya'i phyir
408a2(mdo sde): mer 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ gser du la ma ma yin pa 'di ji ltar na dul mar 'gyur snyam nas/ de'i phyir mer 'jug ste/ shin tu bsregs pa'i phyir rin po rma'i 'os su 'gyur ro// rin po ches spras
408a3(mdo sde): pa de'i rin thang med par 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir gser brdung ba dang / bsregs pas rnam par sbyong ngo // drang srong chen po de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang rgyu med
408a4(mdo sde): par bsregs pa'i bskal pa mi 'byin te/ 'dir sems can gang la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol
408a5(mdo sde): toto/ / bcom ldan 'das bskal pas sregs pa'i me phyung yang sems can gang la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po de bzhin gshes
408a6(mdo sde): pa rnams ni/ sems can gang la yang gnod par mi mdzad do// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ phyogs bcu rnams su char phra mo'i rgyun 'bab pa de bas na/ drang srong chen po de bzhin gshegs
408a7(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams nye bar gnas te/ rang gi lag gis sems can thar par byed pa tshe mang po// drang srong chen po de'i tshe sems can de bzhin gsheg
408b1(mdo sde): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi gzugs kyang mthong / kha dog mdzes pa yang mthong / bskal pas bsregs pa'i 'jigs pa las bdag nyid sgrol bar yang mthong nas dga' ba dang / mchog
408b2(mdo sde): tu dga' ba skyes te/ 'di skad ces bdag cag kyang 'di ltar sgrol pa por gyur cig/ bdag cag kyang 'di ltar gzugs mdzes par gyur cig/ bdag kyang 'di ltar kha dog mdzes par gyur cig ces 'dzer to//
408b3(mdo sde): kha cig ni yid byung nas sems rnam par grol te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed/ kha cig ni len cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'azas bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed
408b4(mdo sde): kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid/ kha cig ni rang byang chub/ kha cig ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob/ kha cig ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon/ kha cig ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ros kyi nang lha
408b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du skye/ kha cig ni sum cu rtsa gsum du/ kha cig ni mtshe mar/ kha cig ni dga' ldan du/ kha cig ni 'phrul dga'/ kha cig ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du
408b6(mdo sde): skye'o/ / drang srong chen po rnam grangs 'di lta bur/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye'o// de bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba rnams dang / stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rnams dang
408b7(mdo sde): khams kyi rgyal po rnams su 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi rab tu yang 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po rnam grangs 'di lta bu de bzhin gshegs
409a1(mdo sde): pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong zhing / bdag nyid kya na rig pa chen po las sgrol bar mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gze zhing byas pa shes par 'gyur ro/
409a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyid thos nas bslab pa'i gnas rnams la bag byed par 'gyur ro// thabs 'di ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po yang sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub
409a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi mig la sa'i khams ji snyed snang bar gyur pa de bas ni/ / sems can gyi khams gang 'khor ba la skyon chags par shes nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyin
409a4(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa ches mang ste/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir bskal pas bsregs par 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong chen po mi sgron gyi rang gi yid kyis rnam par dpyad nas/
409a5(mdo sde): tshig tu smras pa kye ma'o gang dag la drang srong chen po zhes 'bod pa/ shAkya'i sras 'di'i che ba nyid ni rgya che'o// bdag gis 'di la bgam pas kyang cho ga ste/ 'di ni thams cad mkhyen par mngon gyis/ bdag gis kyang
409a6(mdo sde): 'di la yang dag pa'i ming gis bos par bya'o zhes smras so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la zang srong chen po ma sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su gyur cing mkhyen pa dpag tu ma mchis pa
409a7(mdo sde): bam cad mkhyen pa zhes mtshan gsol pa/ sems can gnas gang du 'du bar 'gyur ba bdag la bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// drang srong chen po gnas med pa la sems can 'dul bar
409b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / mnyam pa nyid la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po theg pa gcig gis 'byung ba la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro//
409b2(mdo sde): drang srong chen po phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu klung chen po tha dad pa dang / klung phran dang / klung chen po dag
409b3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen por bab nas/ ro gcig tu 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ji snyed zag pa zad pa byed pa de dag thams cad rnam par grol ba'i ngang du gyur pas 'du bar 'gyur ro//
409b4(mdo sde): drang srong chen po 'khor bar 'du bas sems can 'du bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa'o zhes nga smra'o// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung gis bdas nas phye ma leb gyi byi zhwa la 'du bar 'gyur te/ rlung med na sos
409b5(mdo sde): 'gyes so/ / drang srong chen po de bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bas phan tshun las 'brel pa'i sems can gyi khams de dag kyang der 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po rnam grangs 'di lta bu phan tshun
409b6(mdo sde): kyis 'brel pa dag yi dgasu skye bar 'gyur ro/ / dud 'thor skye bar 'gyur te/ der de dag tu 'du bar 'gyur ro// zang srong chen po lha dang ma rnams su de dag 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang song chen pos gsol pa/
409b7(mdo sde): thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/ thams can mkhyen pa mir skyes pa 'di sems can che ge mo zhes bgyis pa zhig dang 'dus par gyur to// dud 'gror skyes pa 'di zhes bgyib nas
410a1(mdo sde): yi dgas su skyes pa 'di dus par gyur to zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi ba bka' stsal cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po sems can gang zhig sems
410a2(mdo sde): can gang dang lhan cig tu/ sems can dmyal bar skyes nas 'dus par gyur pa des de mthong na yid mi bde bar 'gyur// de zhe sdang bar yang 'gyur/ des de mthong nas/ gal te na de glad pa na bar yang 'gyur//
410a3(mdo sde): bshang ba dang / gci ba 'byung bar yang 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po 'di ni sems can dmyal bar skyes pa rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do// gang la la de ltar gyur pa des kyang / bdag dang
410a4(mdo sde): 'di lhan cig tu sems can dmyal ba rnams na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar khong du chud par bya'o/ / drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ rigs gsal bar mdzad pa// thams cad mkhyen
410a5(mdo sde): pa dud 'gro dang lhan cig gnas gnas pa rnams kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rim skyes pa'i sems can rnams gang gi tshe/ phan tshun
410a6(mdo sde): mthong ba na 'khor du 'dud par 'dzin cing 'di las bdag gis skyon ji ltar snyed snyam du skyon tshol ba 'di ni/ drang srong chen po dud 'gror skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid de
410a7(mdo sde): bdag dang 'di lhan cig tu dud 'gro'i nang na gnas gnas par mngon no/ / zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po yi dgas su skyes pa rnams ni dri nga ba 'dod cing kha zas yang shin tu sred par
410b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / pha rol la sbyin par bsams kyang chags pa skye bar 'gyur ro// gang dag de yi dgas su skyes nas lhan cig dus par 'gyur ba de'i dbang phyug mthong nas phrag dog skye bar 'gyur/ gzhan gyi nor/
410b2(mdo sde): la 'dod par 'gyur te/ 'di ni yi dgas su skyes pa rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do// de la bdag dang 'di lhan cig tu yi dgas kyi nang na gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po
410b3(mdo sde): mir skyes pa gang la la zhig tshe rabs gzhan dag la 'dus par gyur pa ni des de mthong na/ 'dod chags kyi sems skye bar 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po ni mir skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid
410b4(mdo sde): do/ / de la bdag dang 'di mi rnams kyi nang na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// drang srong chen pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gang dag lhar skyes te/ 'dus par gyur
410b5(mdo sde): pa las mir skyes pa de dag gi ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po gang dag lhar skyes te 'dus par gyur pa de dag ni phan tshun mthong na lta ba la 'jug par
410b6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ des na bdag dang 'di lhar skyes te/ lhan cig 'dus par gyur to zhes shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po rnam pa de lta bu dag tu sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro//
410b7(mdo sde): de nas drang srong chen po me sgron dga' mgu yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon par mi bgyid
411a1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can de dag ni bslus pa'o zhes bdag 'chad do/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po me sgron la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po
411a2(mdo sde): nang na sems can zhes bya ba phra ba ji tsam zhig yod ces nga la de skad ces zer ba ni/ drang srong chen po gang sems can du dmigs pa de sems can phra mor rnams par byed do// drang srong chen
411a3(mdo sde): po 'di lta ste dper na/ la la zhig gis dmus long zhig la 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu kha dog dkar po zhes bya ba/ ci 'dra ba zhes smras na/ drang srong chen po 'di ji snyam du sems ma mthong ba'i
411a4(mdo sde): phyir kha dog dkar po 'di 'dra'o zhes de smra bar nus sam/ drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ 'brel pa ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zang srong chen po de bzhin du ngas
411a5(mdo sde): kyang dmus long ltar ma mthong ba'i phyir/ sems can zhes bya ba ni phra mo 'di lta bu zhig go zhes sems can brjod par mi nus so// drang srong chen po yang mig las sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do// /
411a6(mdo sde): rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do// drang srong chen po nye bar len pa'i phung po dag la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do// drang srong chen po khams bco brgyad
411a7(mdo sde): dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la sems can zhes bya ba ma rnyed do// phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la sems can zhu
411b1(mdo sde): bya ba mi rnyed do/ / drang srong chen po mig ni ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o// skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid kyang ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o//
411b2(mdo sde): skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o// drang srong chen po nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o// skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o// zang srong chen po mi gtsang ba'i rdzas sum cu rtsa drug kyang
411b3(mdo sde): ngan pa'o/ / 'jig pa'o// skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o// sems can zhes bya ba yang med/ gzugs kyang med de/ drang srong chen po rdzas 'dus pa ni sems can zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o//
411b4(mdo sde): yongs su rtog pa gang dag rdzas rnams rnam par 'byed pa de dag ni srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu mi dmigs so// drang srong chen po
411b5(mdo sde): gal te sems can yod du zin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag gis shin tu chos ston par mi 'gyur ba zhig na// drang srong chen po gang gi phyir/ sems can med pa de'i phyir/ de bzhin
411b6(mdo sde): gsheg pa nyid thob ste/ de'i phyir ji lta ji ltar yang dag par sgrub par byed de lta de ltar yang dag par 'grub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
411b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad drang srong chen po ma sgron bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag bskal pa mu ma mchi par sems can dmyal ba'i thugs kyi 'obs su
412a1(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ ri rab 'og min gyi gnas tsam du gyur pa mthon po'i la de nas/ bdag gis bdag 'dor bar 'gyur ba'am/ gdung ba lnga bskal pas bsregs pa lta/
412a2(mdo sde): bur 'gyur ba 'am/ nyi ma bskal par gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ bskal pa sum cu'i zla ba gcig tu sbyang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad par ni/ bcom ldan 'das bdag spro ste 'dun gyi/ thams
412a3(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi slad du ni brtson 'grus nyams par mi bgyid pa'o/ / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa ji snyed/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du lhags pa de dag kyang stan las langs te/ bcom
412a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang deng slan chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon par bgyi'o// rdo ci thog gis brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o// /
412a5(mdo sde): drang srong chen po rnams kyis tshig de skad smras ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang smin mtshams
412a6(mdo sde): nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer de dag gi mthus sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mthon/
412a7(mdo sde): lho phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs dma' na/ byang phyogs mtho/ shar phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/
412b1(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du me tog gi char phar/ rnga bo che rnams brdungs so// dri za'i bdag po ming du 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang yan lag lnga'i sil snyan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon
412b2(mdo sde): par bstod do/ / lha'i bdug pa dri rab tu zhim po dag kyang rlung gi ngad bslang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du ngad ldang bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga' ste/ mchog tu bde
412b3(mdo sde): ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du do shal dang / se mo do rnams mthor zhing rin po che'i char yang 'bebs/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma
412b4(mdo sde): dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis kyang mchod pa byed do// lha'i tshogs rnams kyang rab tu dga' nas/ me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra 'a chen po'i char 'bebs so//
412b5(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang dga' mgu yi rang te/ ji ltar gyon gyon pa'i gos rnam de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gsol to// de nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des 'og min gyi gnas
412b6(mdo sde): man chad/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yan chad snang bar byas te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bskor ba byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu
412b7(mdo sde): nub bo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyu ma mchis par shAkya thub de ring 'dir// phyogs bcu dag tu 'od zer mi gtong ste// 'khor
413a1(mdo sde): 'di thams cad the tsom gyur lags na/ / thub pas rgyu dang byed de bdag lung ston// mi yi 'dren pa'i rnam par 'phrul mthong nas// dga' bar gyur cing spro ba che gyur te/ rab tu dag
413a2(mdo sde): pas lhag par bstod bgyis nas/ / kha cig 'di na bcom ldan legs shes mchi// brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// nam mkhar gnas 'byung po'i tshogs dang bstod// mkha' las lha'i me tog
413a3(mdo sde): char du 'bebs/ / ma brdung rnga chen dag ni sgra yang 'byin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor khyod kyis drang srong me sgron mthong ngam/
413a4(mdo sde): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor drang srong chen po me sgron 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas stong 'das pa'i
413a5(mdo sde): 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la zla ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor
413a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi ming yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnam par dag pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor drang srong chen po brgyad khri ba ni stong gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
413a7(mdo sde): ma thag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i sa rjes su thob ste/ rab 'byor de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur ro// bskal pa sum brgya'i 'og tu de
413b1(mdo sde): / bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa gang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdag bka' blo bde ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag gi kyang chos
413b2(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ skad dang skad ma yin pa shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba'i dbang bskur ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge
413b3(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / khams rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / blo gros rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin mnyen pa'i sa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bsam pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang
413b4(mdo sde): 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ / rab 'byor lha bye ba phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma stong
413b5(mdo sde): phrag tshad med pa dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ / rab 'byor lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang
413b6(mdo sde): mi dang / mi ma yin pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de mthong nas 'dul can zhes bya ba'i
413b7(mdo sde): 'od zer rnams phyung ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'ad kyi nyid kyi ljags kyi dbang pos zhal khebs par mdzad de/ ljags kyi dbang po de las kha dog du ma/ kha dog tha dad pa'i 'od zer 'di lta ste/ sngon
414a1(mdo sde): po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa
414a2(mdo sde): dag tu mngon par byung nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis su nub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
414a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bzhud nas/
414a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang
414a5(mdo sde): lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu ma dad pa rnams kyi don du ljags 'di lta bu
414a6(mdo sde): ni brdzun mi gsung ngo snyam du bya ba'i phyir/ ljags kyi dbang pos 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol
414a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam lung 'bog na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam bskyed par
414b1(mdo sde): / 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag la yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi
414b2(mdo sde): bar du gang zhig gis bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyi bsnyen bkur byas te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byed pa de bas/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
414b3(mdo sde): las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam lung 'bog na/ 'di ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa na/ gang zhig dang ba'i sems kyis legs so
414b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba sbyin pa de la/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod par 'gyur ro// gang gis 'di la rim gro byas pa des nga la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
414b5(mdo sde): kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la rnam par gzigs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag nga ni bden par smra ba ste/ sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags pa'i sa
414b6(mdo sde): phyogs de la/ sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'dzam bu gling pa'i sems can rnams kyi sman du gyur par 'gyur ro// gang gis chos kyi rnam
414b7(mdo sde): grangs 'di lan gsum brjod dam/ brjod du bcug na/ des ston pa la chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskul bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir
415a1(mdo sde): 'jug pa de bde ba dang bcas shing yid bde bde ba dang bcas bzhin du/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// nges sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzod kyang
415a2(mdo sde): bzung bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can rnams kyi rna lam du zag par mi 'gyur ro// sku gnas nas phas yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
415a3(mdo sde): rnams su skye ba de dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor gang gis sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de'i rna lam du ches kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ro//
415a4(mdo sde): rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ dang dam 'chang ngam/ klog gam be ngar/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag pa
415a5(mdo sde): ston par 'gyur ba de'i lag tu byang chub song ngo zhes bshad do/ / des mig lnga thob par 'gyur/ dbang po ma tshang bar mang gyur/ dran pa brjod pa med par 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur/
415a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ rnam par snang mdzad rnam par sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gtsug gi
415a7(mdo sde): nor bu'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'jas rab tu thob par 'gyur/ yi ge med pa'i tha ma tog gi
415b1(mdo sde): gzungs thob par 'gyur/ chos thams cad la rnam par rgyal ba thob pa'i gzungs dang / the tsom rnam par sbyong ba'i gzungs dang / don dam pa rnam par nges pa'i gzungs thob
415b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa'i gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong mtha' yangs pa thob par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
415b3(mdo sde): bsams bzhin du 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpa'
415b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa khyod la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su btad kyis yang dang yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu shod cig/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de
415b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsti stang byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang / rim gror byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa de ji snyam du sems// 'jam dpal dge ba'i rtsa ba
415b6(mdo sde): de la mtha' 'am/ mu yod dam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dpag par nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bde bar
415b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis smig ma lnga'i dus na/ chos kyi rnams grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
416a1(mdo sde): 'dir rgyas par byed par 'gyur ba de dag de las dge ba'i rtsa ba chen por 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa mang po de snyed cig lan bza'
416a2(mdo sde): dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gsos kyi sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston par mi byed na// khyod da dung du yang de
416a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la'ang phyag mi byed kyi/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par byed na de
416a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la khyod kyis mchod pa'i bar du byas par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / drang srong chen
416a5(mdo sde): po me smon dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
416a6(mdo sde): 'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ngan
416a7(mdo sde): d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsa dur d+harma nir de shan
416b1(mdo sde): / nA ma mahA yA nA sU dzA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos bani bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
416b2(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i nang na/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs na/ dge slong lnga brgya zam pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang
416b3(mdo sde): byams pa dang 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
416b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// sdig pa chen po byas shing bsags pa zil gyis non
416b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / gzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa dang // gnyen po kun tu spyod pa dang / sor chud par byed pa'i stobs dang // rten gyi stobs so//
416b6(mdo sde): de la rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa ni/ mi dge pa'i las spyad na de la 'gyid pa mang ba yin no// de la gnyen po kun tu spyod pa ni mi dge ba'i las byas nas kyang dge ba'i las la shin tu brtson pa'o//
416b7(mdo sde): del sor chung bar byed pa'i stobs ni// sdom pa yang dag par blangs pas mi byed pa'i sdom pa thob pa'o// de la rten gyi stobs ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang
417a1(mdo sde): chub kyi sems mi gtong ba ste/ de stobs dang ldan pa la rten pas sdig pas zil gyis gnon par mi nus so// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi pa
417a2(mdo sde): de dag dang ldan na/ sdig pa byas shing bsags pa rin gyis non par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mdo 'di rtag tu bklag par bya'o// kha ton du bya'o// bsam par
417a3(mdo sde): bya'o/ / sgom par bya'o// mang du bya'o// des na nyes par spyad pa 'bras bu 'byin mi nus par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
417a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po byams pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rang te/ bcom ldan 'das
417a5(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren rnga bo d+hi dang /
417a6(mdo sde): chen gyi lo tsA ba dan d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la grub pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsa tur d+harma kan nA ma mahA yA na sUH
417a7(mdo sde): 'od skad du/ 'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
417b1(mdo sde): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshil mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dkyu' ra ba na/ dge slong stong gis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang rnams cig
417b2(mdo sde): 'azhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs cig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byang chub sems
417b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos bzhi po 'di dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtong ngo / / bzhi gang zhe na/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
417b4(mdo sde): chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ byang chub kyi sems srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtong ba dang / dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar
417b5(mdo sde): du dge ba'i bshes gnyen srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtong ba dang dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ bzod pa dang des
417b6(mdo sde): pa srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtong ba dang dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ dgon pa la gnas pa srog gi phyir yang
417b7(mdo sde): yongs su mi gtong ste/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du chos bzhi po 'di dag srog gi phyir yang yongs su gtong bar mi
418a1(mdo sde): / byabacom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas// ston pas gzhan
418a2(mdo sde): yang 'di skad bka' stsal to/ / thams cad mkhyen nyid sems ni mi gtong zhing // mkhas pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' cig/ bzod dang des
418a3(mdo sde): ba'i stobs la rab gnas te/ / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su gtong mi bya// ri dgas rgyal po bzhin du 'jigs spangs te/ mkhas pas dgon gnas
418a4(mdo sde): rtag tu bsten par bya/ / chos 'di dag la rtag tu rab gnas nas/ bdud rnams bcom nas byang chub de 'tshang rgya// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
418a5(mdo sde): bkar stsal nasadage slong de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'i ra te/ bcom ldan
